Job Description:
* Job purpose
Supervision and Monitoring and Control for civil and structural site work on High Rise, Low rise and
other general structures. The candidate will supervise and provide inspection oversight for civil site works,
foundations, and structural for buildings, including enforcement of the QA/QC program and completion of
related quality assurance documents (where so required).
The candidate will be required to work at the construction site. The activities will be done in coordination
with the CMEDCC site manager on each specific site.
The candidate will interact with other project team members, the customer, and suppliers of goods and
services.
* Duties and responsibilities

- Perform all daily inspection and test of the scope and character necessary to achieve the quality of
construction required in the drawings and specifications for all works under the contract performed ON or OFF site.
- Cary out inspection and checking for all quality related procedures in the site and ensures activity
at site are as per approved method statement and inspection test plan.
- Coordinate with the consultant’s representative and Site En-charge for inspection and meeting about quality problems including closure of Non-Compliance Report.
- Report to the QA/QC Manager, control and monitor all activities related to Quality
- Taking care of QA/QC documents of the entire project including certificates, calibration, test results, inspection requests, non-compliance reports and site instruction/observations, permanent materials delivered and other QA/QC documents. Responsible for closure of Non-conformance, NCR and Site Instruction, SI.
6. Responsible in the quality and workmanship of every activities, thorough knowledge of all phases of engineering construction relating to Civil, Architectural and Structural discipline interfacing the multidisciplinary operations.
- Develop method statement for the activity including risk assessment and job safety environmental analysis and Inspection Test Plan and Checklist based on specifications of the project.
- Carry out Internal Audit at site as scheduled in the Project Quality Plan, PQP.
- Liaise the Technical Engineer for submission of material submittals to Consultant.

requirements are met.

Job Description:
- Create test plans, manages, plans, constructs, and executes tests and integrates with the release control process.
- Author functional test cases for product enhancements and modifications (test scenarios, conditions, and data) and assist with maintaining and improving existing test cases.
- Assist in preparing and reviewing the product test plan and strategy.
- Conduct test execution (both manual and automated).
- Work with developers to resolve product defects in new and existing functionality.
- Ensure testing commitments are met and communicate potential impacts to target dates to the Director QA.
- Identify risks to testing and communicate with the Director QA.
- Adhere to all QA processes and procedures. Assist in identifying and implementing new process improvements.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Math or equivalent
- 1 - 2 years’ experience testing enterprise software products
- Proven problem solving and troubleshooting skills
- Excellent documentation and communication skills
- Good communication and teamwork skills
- Experience using automation tools e.g. UFT/QTP, Ranorex, Selenium or Coded-UI preferred
- Experience in Agile methodology preferred
- Experience in web and mobile app development preferred
- High level of English communication

- Working day and time: Flexible
- Holidays: Cambodian national holidays
- Competitive salary and quarterly incentives
- English training program
- Medical and life insurance
- Maternity and paternity leave

- Yearly company trip

Job Description: This role is responsible for managing S&OP processes and identifying the Risks and Opportunities in these emerging markets and ensures the S&OP processes integrated and S&OP tools enabled.** Main Duties:• To collaborate with the Management team, Sales, Marketing, Finance, and Supply Chain to ensure S&OP processes integrated and S&OP tools enabled.• To be Committed, Realistic, Integrated, and Team player to contribute to the Business Plans and Strategies. • To understand the Business-Wide implication and having the focus throughout the Value Chain studies.• To identify the changes within the Business and translate them to the information and Data for decision making.• To identify actions and alternative plans to manage the changes and derive the Gaps closing plan and proposal as the output.• To assist the Management to make the decision to respond to the changes and optimize the business• Tracking, monitoring, and updating the S&OP processes on the weekly basis.• People Development   o Succession planning  o Lean to improve behavior.  o Identify and propose training for self and team members for improvements.
Job Requirement: • Preferably a minimum of 7 years in an FMCG environment with at least 5 years managerial experience in a Sales Operational or Supply Chain management role.• Having experience in Finance, S&OP, Data Analysis, or Supply Chain is highly preferred.• Integrity, Self-Discipline, Trustworthy, and reliability.• Proficiency written and spoken in English.• Excellent communication skills (interpersonal/Reporting/Microsoft Office)• Solid analytical, Planning, and Organizing skills.• Excellent business acumen and a good understanding of the market with entrepreneurial zest.• Self-starter mindset, Self-Confident, good work Ethic, Assertive, Effective, Positive, and Energetic Attitude.• Must be a Systematic person capable of cooperating across the functions.• Ability to communicate clearly - Decent presentation skills.• Strong Leadership skills, Team-orientation, and ability to coach the team.• Action-oriented, persistent, and result-oriented.

Company Profile: Why Work with Us: Etiqa Life Insurance (Cambodia) PLC., a member of Maybank Group, is a leading ASEAN insurer with presence in Cambodia, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, and the Philippines. At Etiqa, our aspiration is “We want to make the world a better place”. Hence, we are always looking for new ways to make our products and services Fast & Easy. Our longer term plan is to become a leading life insurer providing innovative and inclusive financial protection solutions to the market, which is in line with the government’s financial inclusiveness strategy. Etiqa, on the other hand, is a place that values hard-work, agility, consistency, and inclusivity by which equal opportunity is given to every single one in the company.   As we are constantly accelerating our growth in Cambodia, we are looking for an ambitious candidate to join us as Attractive package is available for the chosen candidate.

Job Description: - Assist to establish, implement and maintain the Company’s compliance policies, procedures, programs, plans etc.;- Prepare all applications for permits/licenses/approvals necessary for the operation of the Company with relevant authorities;- Prepare draft legal advice and opinions to various business functions of the Company; - Draft/review/translate letters/agreements/contracts with vendors and partners as assigned; - Assist in reviewing insurance products and services for submission to the regulatory authority; - Provide assistance in handling customer complaints and the investigation of complaints; - Provide legal research in various laws/regulations relevant to the business; - Assist all tasks as assigned to support the Company’s corporate secretariat function; - Maintain proper docketing of company records including signed agreements, licenses, all approval letters and/or any other important documents etc.; and - Perform other secretarial, legal, compliance, substantive and administrative duties and other tasks as assigned from time to time.
Job Requirement: - Law degree holder from reputable universities;- At least 3 years of relevant post qualifications working experience, preferably in legal firms or in house lawyers in insurance companies; - Good knowledge of legal requirements and procedures;- Good oral and written legal & compliance communication skills in Khmer and English; - Analytical with strong attention to detail; - Teamwork and fast learner; and - Independent, self-driven and resourceful.  - Experience in similar field is advantage;- Willing to learn about new industry; and - Understand complexity of in-house legal & compliance functions in insurance industry.

company_name: U-Life KH Super App Co., Ltd.
Job Description: •	Facilitate the creation and maintenance of proper product documentation.•	Analyzing workflows and ensuring efficient delivery of software updates. Ensure clear communication across teams.•	Work with management and relevant departments spanning multiple countries to deliver products’ goals.•	Collect, analyze, and document product requirements from stakeholder, customers and relevant parties to define the products’ goals and strategies.•	Flesh out ideas with wireframes, mock-up designs, performance and benefit estimates and present these ideas for review.•	Managing scrum teams including initial feature planning, prioritization, product roadmap analysis and overall delivery timeline•	Build and maintain products’ features’ roadmap and version document.•	Understand, research and follow technology trends in the industry and in general. •	Follow competitors and conduct capability analysis regularly.•	Provide internal and customer training on how to use the product.•	Answer incoming questions about the product and its capabilities.•	Assess and address technical risks.•	Understand and analyses data pipelines, algorithms and automated systems.•	Serve as a product evangelist and subject matter expert to the technical/developer community.•	Plan and execute training and workshops for internal and external parties.•	Build and manage developer community.•	Coordinate beta tests.•	Use database queries to analyses performance indicators, evaluate experiments, etc.•	Define success criteria for testing and product acceptance.
Job Requirement: •	At least 3 years working in a project, product, technology or solutions role in a tech company, or been in a similar position in a demonstrably high pressure, data-driven, fast-paced environment. •	A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Financial IT or related field preferred.•	Experienced in working and reporting to multiple department heads and stakeholders.•	Able to assess emerging products and companies to measure their potential value or threat to the company and its products.•	Make recommendations on which new technologies to invest in or leverage.•	Familiar with fintech and mobile apps industry.•	Strong verbal and written English communication skills across all levels of the organization.•	Proven track record of taking ownership and successfully delivering results in a fast-paced, dynamic environment•	Strong documentation skills.•	Proven leadership skills.•	Highly Self-Driven and Results Oriented.•	Knowledge of UX/UI best practices a plus
Company Profile:
Super App/Cambodian Single Point is a life service E-Commerce platform founded by Cambodia Information Technology Co., Ltd. and Cambodia Super App Information Technology Co., Ltd. in 2020. It is mainly engaged in online take-out and new retail instant food delivery, and catering supply chain and other businesses.
With the mission of creating a simple life, Cambodia is committed to using the new technology to create a leading one-stop service platform in Southeast Asia and the world, to promote the digitization process in Southeast Asia and bring a new Internet life experience
Contact Info: Contact Information Sereyvin Operation Director 012350316 jobs@wownow-kh.com Phnom Penh https://maps.app.goo.gl/1KSCSM8eQsi481d66 012350316

With the mission of creating a simple life, Cambodia is committed to using the new technology to create a leading one-stop service platform in Southeast Asia and the world, to promote the digitization process in Southeast Asia and bring a new Internet life experience

Job Description: We are looking for a high-performing Sales Supervisor to help us meet our customeracquisition and revenue growth targets by keeping our company competitive and innovative.You will be responsible for maximizing our sales team potential, crafting sales plans andjustifying those to plans to the upper management.1. Achieve growth and hit sales targets by successfully managing the sales team;2. Design and implement a strategic business plan that expands company’s customer baseand ensure its strong presence;3. Own recruiting, objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of salesrepresentatives;4. Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with themand understanding their needs;5. Present sales, revenue and expenses reports and realistic forecasts to the managementteam;6. Identify emerging markets and market shifts while being fully aware of new products andcompetition status.
Job Requirement: 1. BA degree in business administration or a related field;2. Successful previous experience as a sales representative or sales supervisor, orexceeding targets3. Excellent mentoring, coaching and people management skills;4. Being Honest
Company Profile:
CAMHR is Cambodia’s leading human resources and recruitment company, specializing in providing human capital resources and assets. Launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO. LTD, we have grown from specializing in online recruitment to offline, sourcing employees of all standards for businesses and organizations across the country. 

Through our dedicated team of internationally-trained experts, we combine state-of-the-art technology, data analysis and a comprehensive network of partners to find the right person for your business. Calling on our well-established network of potential candidates, we conduct the screening process, saving your company time while ensuring you secure the perfect person to help your business grow. 

Our success and expertise has led to thousands of jobseekers using our services every month to search the more than 5,000 live job ads, and our shift to focus on providing companies with a tool to recruit the best staff possible has seen CAMHR become Cambodia’s elite recruitment agency.

Job Description: We are looking for a results-driven Sales Representative with excellent interpersonal skills toactively seek out and engage customer prospects.1. Present, promote and sell products/services;2. Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships3. Reach out to customer leads through cold calling4. Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction5. Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule6. Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments7. Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests,competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.8. Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends9. Continuously improve through feedback
Job Requirement: 1. Proven work experience as a Sales Representative2. Excellent knowledge of MS Office3. Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales4. Excellent selling, negotiation and communication skills5. Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills6. Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs7. Relationship management skills and openness to feedback8. Bachelor’s degree in business or a related field

Job Description: •	Responsible for providing to direction and leadership required to achieve professional technical services and quality standards •	Responsible for communicating company objective and politics and to encourage employee participation and personal growth •	Responsible for observing service personal in repair circumstances and for providing the coaching necessary to develop diagnostic, safe, clean, efficient and efficient and effective high-quality work.•	 Oversees all clerical functions necessary to support to work order process (open/close, labor posting, sublet repair, internal & external part, etc.)  •	Maintain work relation with the parts department and sees that proper procedures, records and reports concerning parts for service are in order •	Assist the preparation of service quotes as needed for sales and / or proposals and cooperates with the sales department and evaluating used equipment for trade in and assist in setting up equipment at shows, exhibits, demos, etc. •	Make recommendations for tools and equipment and other facility capital expenditures and ensure that they are maintained in good working order •	Make recommendations regarding service vehicle and asset purchase and coordinate those purchase and ensure that vehicles and assets are maintain in good working order •	Maintain working relations and negotiates with manufacturers on warrant, policy, tooling requirements and customer support matters •	Work closely with training to determine technical needs and help coordinates the training on an ongoing basis •	Develop markets for service department current abilities and future revenue opportunities•	Develop and maintain all service efficiency and management reports required by the company •	Responsible for working with HR to recruit, hire, and train service employees•	Formal employee performance reviews will be held service personal •	KIP reviews will be conducted at least annually for each service technician with special reviews performed according to employee performance •	Responsible for setting wage levels and technical grade evaluation for all service personnel •	Direct involvement with in field customer issues resolution •	Responsible for the morale and discipline for the service personnel working within company policies, including termination, if necessary•	Purchase and / or acquirement motor vehicles and equipment as well as tools, parts, materials, and supplies used in heavy equipment repair and maintenance
Job Requirement: •	Maintain excellent communications skill, both oral and written •	Maintain excellent customer relations and strong interpersonal skills •	Maintain high employee morale •	Attain short and long objective through good management and planning •	Should be personable, highly motivated, a problems solver, ethical, and able to adapt to all around them customer, suppliers, coworker, and manufactures •	Work s in an efficient and effective manner•	Contribution to department and product line goals•	Must have a positive mental attitude

Job Description:
Responsibilities:

The Junior Interior Quantity Surveyor is responsible for assisting in budget calculations, learning how to manage project deadlines, learning the governing rules and regulations, and performing proper client and employee relations actions.
•Forecast the price/cost of the different materials needed for the project
•Prepare tender documents, contracts, budgets, bills of quantities and other documentation
•Track changes to the design and/or construction work and adjusting budget projections accordingly
•Measure and value the work done on site
•Liaise with the client and other construction professionals, such as site managers, project managers and site engineers
•Select and/or source construction materials
•Review and checking the BOQ at the starting of the work.
•Prepare lists of the site needs (material, workers, technicians)
•Prepare the detailed reports describing the situation of the items quantities, (plus or minus the contract BOQ)
•Support the Senior Quantity Surveyor and team in the commercial aspects of the business.
•Provide assistance managing projects according to contractual obligations.
•Prepare and resolve monthly applications, invoices, and payments according to deadlines.
Job Requirement:
•Bachelor degree in Architecture, Interior Designer or structural engineering related field.
•1- years of work experience related field or fresh graduate
•Practical experience with CAD software, sketch up or others programs related field.
•Knowledge of engineering and construction
•Strong communication skills and attention to detail.
•Willingness to work overtime when required

Job Requirement:
• Fresh Graduate Are Welcome to Apply.
• Any Bachelor/Master’s degree.
• Good at Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.
• Have a growth mindset with a positive attitude.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net Phnom Penh #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #320, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Tek Laak 1, Khan Toul Kok 017 888 349

Job Description:
•	Assists customers in selecting and purchasing parts.

•	Reads appropriate manuals to ascertain type and specification of parts.

•	Good verbal and written communication
•	Diagnosing technical program

•	Able to travel to provinces base on requirement

•	Organizational Awareness

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
·                 Identify key contacts at potential client or partner companies to establish and foster a relationship for collaboration on sales, promotion campaign, discount partnership etc. 

·                 Understand the problems and challenges of clients or partners and identify ways the business could better address those needs.

·                 Identify new target market, opportunities to cross-sell or upsell to existing clients.

·                 Monitor and assess activities of our competitors to proactively satisfy and retain our clients or partners.

·                 Working with creative designer and marketing team to produce or create POSM, Merchandise, and other marketing materials for Ford Cambodia Club Project.

·                 Distribute all POSM, Merchandise, and other marketing materials to all outlet of clients and partner companies. 

·                 Prepare event proposal, checklist, budget plan from pre-production until finish event

·                 Provide leadership, motivation, and direction and support to marketing team

·                 Weekly, monthly and yearly report about sales revenue, all clients and market segment

·                 Other task assign by Manager.
Job Requirement:
·                 B achelor’s degree in business, marketing, management, or related field.

·                 At least 2 years in Sales & Marketing

·                 Specialize in Event Management, Product Analyze and Research Skill.

·                 Skill in negotiation, relationship management and problem solving

·                 Outgoing and customer-oriented attitude.

·                 Be able to work independently and with minimum supervision,

·                 Able to go nationwide location for marketing research.

Job Description:
- Assist the Talent team performances are productive and on-time onboarding. 
- Ensure employment contract is signed on time.
- Ensure the on-time and accuracy of new staff data entry and employment requisition form
- Assist and facilitate job exhibition events and other events.
- Ensure all reports are accurate and submit on time.
- Ensure the administration work are completed on time and accurate. 
- Collecting related documents from new joiners following the New Staff Checklist.
- Properly correct Key-In staff’s information in Employee Master list.
- Ensure the contract for new joiner to at first day join and never late.
- Prepare documents for new staffs and checklist on deadline then submit to C&B.

- Lead on staff resignation report only.
- Offering job to successful candidates.
- Request office material to related department for new staffs.
Job Requirement:
- At least 1 years of work experience in the contracting field and/or from construction sector is preferable
- Proficiency in Khmer and English language
- Reporting skills
- Good at Ms. Office, Outlook express and other online applications
- Good in communication and interpersonal skills
- Effective team and relationship building
- Good knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
- Work under pressure and flexible 
- Excellent communication, diplomatic and organizational skills
- Negotiation skills.

Company Profile: Cambrew Ltd.  the largest and most modern brewery in the country, produces a variety of national and international beer, stout, soft drink and water. Its brewery is situated in the main port city of Cambodia known as Sihanoukville, about 230km west of the capital Phnom Penh.Cambrew (Angkor Beer) portfolio of Beers, Stouts, Soft Drinks and bottled water in Cambodia. Our brands include the Kingdom’s most loved beer – Angkor Premium Beer, Angkor Premium Extra Stout, Klang, Black Panther, Turbog, Carlsberg, Guinness, Pepsi, Angkor Puro and many more. Keen to embark on a career with a portfolio of renowned local and international brands?Join us and be part of a dynamic and exciting team today!

Job Description: Maintenance - Responsible to lead the equipment reliability inclusive maintenance activities at dedicated area as per Maintenance COM- Responsible for maintenance KPI example OEE, B&D, WO creation & completion, % PM, and total maintenance cost/HL within agreed target- Responsible for work order (WO) scoping, prioritization, quality of work order detail, distribute of work orders, and the effective follow up and closing out of work orders- To assign work and manpower scheduling with line responsible through work order system- To review technician skills matrix and roles from time to time- Responsible for COM audit with maintenance manager - To lead line responsible and communication with production line leader for any production plan and OEE improvement - Implement and review WI, SMP & OPL- To attend daily packaging PMS meeting at related area and escalate breakdown issue during maintenance PMS board- Weekly meeting with production line leader for maintenance service windows and TBM activities- Provide and conduct weekly performance evaluation and plan for improvement by RCA or advanced problem solving - To carry the overhaul planning, manpower scheduling, spare part list, and review as per COM - Troubleshoot and attend for any breakdown even off office hour- Well maintain all maintenance documents and records system- To contact OEM for any downtime and spare part detail - workshop management Quality - Practice GMP, understand HACCP process and food safety risk- Apply toolbox hygiene standard and workshop area cleanliness- To monitor/improve rejection from line within agreed rate which reduce wastage- Support QC for quality activitiesCE - Leading and participating in various maintenance improvement project based on Lead TPM- Ensures ideas of continues improvement are captures- Update any new ideas into work instructions, OPL and SMP- Key drive implementation of Lead TPM activities example 5S, Gemba Kaizen, PMS and problem solving at maintenance area- Support production and maintenance for AM, PM and SMED
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor/ Engineering degree in mechanical, process engineering, electrical engineering, or relevant areas.2. Knowledge of maintenance standards and maintenance system3. English (spoken and written) – an advantage.4. Willing to learn and drive for results5. Good interpersonal skill, able to communicate, work together to all level and empowering people6. Innovative in problem solving7. Basic technological skill: Microsoft Office software like Excel, Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and more8. Able to work under pressure

Job Description:
-Manage operating departmental budgets and costs according to annual allocation to ensure efficient usage of resources, where applicable
Develop and implement processes and strategies (local go-to-market strategies, sales strategies and customer strategies) for assigned customers to ensure achievement of goals
Monitor team key performance indicators achievement. Conduct regular reviews to provide feedback on achievements, performance gaps and requirements for improvement
Identify the short-term business needs and objectives of key customers and develop/sell proactive business solutions across the full demand/supply chain
Manage annual negotiations, including trading terms and conditions, to facilitate sales agreements and achieve targeted margins
Manage and monitor 5P execution performance (availability, pricing, share of shelf, etc.) and ensure issues are quickly resolved by the team
Develop deep insights and actionable recommendations from post-evaluation analyses and incorporate into customer strategies
Manage reporting of sales and projected sales/margin forecasts. Evaluate trends and form meaningful conclusions to facilitate strategic decisions
Develop, monitor and recommend improvement initiatives on business processes, customer services and new techniques (category management, scanning, etc.)
Develop and build relationships with customers and a network of contacts to order to understand customer needs and achieve business objectives
Work closely with the cross-functional teams (e.g. Trade Marketing, Product Manager and Supply Chain Management) to ensure efficient and effective execution
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description: •	Responsible for providing to direction and leadership required to achieve professional technical services and quality standards •	Responsible for communicating company objective and politics and to encourage employee participation and personal growth •	Responsible for observing service personal in repair circumstances and for providing the coaching necessary to develop diagnostic, safe, clean, efficient and efficient and effective high-quality work.•	 Oversees all clerical functions necessary to support to work order process (open/close, labor posting, sublet repair, internal & external part, etc.)  •	Maintain work relation with the parts department and sees that proper procedures, records and reports concerning parts for service are in order •	Assist the preparation of service quotes as needed for sales and / or proposals and cooperates with the sales department and evaluating used equipment for trade in and assist in setting up equipment at shows, exhibits, demos, etc. •	Make recommendations for tools and equipment and other facility capital expenditures and ensure that they are maintained in good working order •	Make recommendations regarding service vehicle and asset purchase and coordinate those purchase and ensure that vehicles and assets are maintain in good working order •	Maintain working relations and negotiates with manufacturers on warrant, policy, tooling requirements and customer support matters •	Work closely with training to determine technical needs and help coordinates the training on an ongoing basis •	Develop markets for service department current abilities and future revenue opportunities•	Develop and maintain all service efficiency and management reports required by the company •	Responsible for working with HR to recruit, hire, and train service employees•	Formal employee performance reviews will be held service personal •	KIP reviews will be conducted at least annually for each service technician with special reviews performed according to employee performance •	Responsible for setting wage levels and technical grade evaluation for all service personnel •	Direct involvement with in field customer issues resolution •	Responsible for the morale and discipline for the service personnel working within company policies, including termination, if necessary•	Purchase and / or acquirement motor vehicles and equipment as well as tools, parts, materials, and supplies used in heavy equipment repair and maintenance
Job Requirement: •	Maintain excellent communications skill, both oral and written •	Maintain excellent customer relations and strong interpersonal skills •	Maintain high employee morale •	Attain short and long objective through good management and planning •	Should be personable, highly motivated, a problems solver, ethical, and able to adapt to all around them customer, suppliers, coworker, and manufactures •	Work s in an efficient and effective manner•	Contribution to department and product line goals•	Must have a positive mental attitude

Job Description:
- Setting sale and profitability targets for individual fleets and your team as a whole
- Monitoring your fleets sale/service performance and demand.
- Draw strategic plan and carry out implementation accordingly.
- Continuously looking for area for implementation to achieve higher efficiency and Effectiveness of sale/services and factory operations.
- Weekly update and analyze total market situation / customer feedback.
- Prepare monthly production report and analysis.
- Build culture of teamwork and P-D-C-A among factory staff while maintaining excellent staff morale.
- Deal with some major customer account yourself and handle complains.
- Maintains contact with all clients in the market area to ensure high levels of client Satisfaction.
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions
•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)
•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.
•	Strong time management and result oriented.
•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. 
•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities
•	Discretion and Dedication

Monitor company’s advertising and promotion and report to management.
- Carry out planned marketing activities efficiently in timely manner.
- Tracking and analyzing competitors’ advertising and promotion.

- Establishing good relationships with media, handling press releases as well as 
  managing web initiatives
- Other tasks assigned by managements.

Cambodian nationality
- Bachelor Degree in Sales/Marketing or related field.
-  Minimum 1 year of experience in Sales and Marketing, preferred from automotive 
   industry.
-  Must be able to work well with diverse groups of people from various departments
- Strong interpersonal and communication skill.
- Familiar with MS. Office, Photoshop, Illustrator.

Job Description:
•	Involve in setting sale target for the team.
•	Meet and exceed the set targets
•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.
•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.
•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. 
•	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.
•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.
•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. 
•	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team

•	Strong time management and result oriented.

•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities
•	Discretion and Dedication

job title: គ្រូបឋមភូមិគ្រប់មុខវិជ្ជា​ (សាខាក្រុងតាខ្មៅ)
company_name: Zhong Ying International School (中英国际学校）
position: គ្រូបឋមភូមិគ្រប់មុខវិជ្ជា​ (សាខាក្រុងតាខ្មៅ)
Job Description: តួនាទី និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវ•រៀបចំផែនការ និងធ្វើបទបង្ហាញមេរៀនដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលដល់ការយល់ដឹង និងការអនុវត្ត របស់សិស្ស•រៀបចំ និងដាក់អោយសិស្សនូវកំណត់ចំណាំ លំហាត់ កិច្ចការសាលា និងកម្រងសំណួរផ្សេងៗ•ស្វែងរកឯកសារ ឬ សម្ភារៈដែលចាំបាច់សម្រាប់មេរៀន•ធានាថាថ្នាក់រៀននៅតែមានសុវត្ថិភាព និងអំណោយផលដល់ការសិក្សា•ចាត់ថ្នាក់កិច្ចការរបស់សិស្ស និង កម្រងសំណួរឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា•ធ្វើជាអនុរក្សនៅពេលដែលមានសំណួរ ឬ ប្រលងប្រចាំខែ/បញ្ចប់វគ្គ•ចងក្រងជាឯកសារ និងរាយការណ៍អំពីភាពរីកចម្រើនរបស់សិស្ស•ផ្តល់ឱ្យសិស្សគ្រប់រូបនូវការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និង លើកទឹកចិត្តពួកគេឱ្យសម្រេចបាននូវ សក្តានុពលរបស់ពួកគេ•អភិវឌ្ឍការយល់ដឹងរបស់សិស្សមិនត្រឹមតែក្នុងមេរៀន ប៉ុណ្ណោះ ប៉ុន្តែថែមទាំងក្នុងបរិបទធំទូលាយក្នុងសង្គមដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍសិស្សក្នុងសកម្មភាពសិក្សា បន្ថែមទាក់ទងនឹងគណិតវិទ្យា និងរូបវិទ្យា •វិនិយោគពេលវេលាបន្ថែមលើការបង្រៀនដើម្បីធានាថា សិស្សទទួលបានការរៀនប្រកបដោយ ស្តង់ដារ•មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ•ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងទៀតដែលចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការការងារ•បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកអប់រំជាមួយជំនាញឯកទេស•មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនយ៉ាងតិច ១ឆ្នាំ•មានទំនាក់ទំនងខាងផ្នែកនិយាយ និងសរសេរល្អ។•មានការរៀបចំបានល្អ និងអាចបត់បែនបានតាមកាលៈទេសៈ។•មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អប្រសើរ។•គាំទ្រពីបេសកកម្ម និងគុណតម្លៃស្នូលរបស់សាលាអន្តរជាតិ ចុងអ៊ីង •មានជំនាញក្នុងការបង្រៀន រៀបចំមេរៀន សម្ភារបង្រៀននិងមានជំនាញក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់រៀន•មានកាយល់ដឹងអំពីការវិវត្តរបស់សិស្ស និងយកមកអនុវត្តតាមទ្រឹស្តីនៃការអប់រំបានត្រឹមត្រូវ•ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស អាចប្រើប្រាស់បានកាន់តែប្រសើរ•ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ដូចជា Microsoft Office និង Email ជាដើមរបៀបដាក់ពាក្យបេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានសម្ថភាពអាចដាក់ពាក្យតាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែល ឬតេលេហ្រ្កាមខាងក្រោម ៖E-mail: hr@zhongying.edu.khTelegram: 015 62 5000Tel: 015/089 625000

company_name: Zhong Ying International School (中英国际学校）
Job Description: Duties and Responsibilities •Develop training material including the contents, activities and schedule that are suited to all levels of management.•Ensure the training budget is spent efficiently and effectively accordance to the school policy. •Review existing training materials from time to time to ensure adequacy.•Ensure all staff meets training requirements (internal & external) by using tracking reports•Monitor training effectiveness and give feedback to the management/team in order to improve training delivery.•Develop training needs analysis to determine possible new or refresher training.•Work with the financial department to determine the training needs of all the staff.•Ensure training activities are well tracked and training reports are accurately produced.•Prepare and participate in each expert department to develop the training program for the effective training•Prepare and implement the training budgets•Develop the training need assessment of school and plan the training program accordingly•Set the behavioral objectives and develops training and development plan•Travel to the campus to identify and analyze the training and development gaps and propose the training course and activities to the manager of training Development Unit•Develop, monitor, and implement training program with School. •Build and establish a professional relationships with institutions/ people you think will have a direct or indirect influence on the implementation of staff training and development Plan•Supervise the development of training program/ Curriculum/ syllabus and the needed material/ references•Supervise training Course arrangement support, course development, course evaluation, process measurement, and training cost management•Ensures that all training are conducted with qualities and properly documented•Coordinate the selections of participants in each campus to join the training program•Initiate the conduct of post-training impact evaluation to determine the training effects on job•Provide support to department head in responding to the training issue•Coordinate efforts to ensure that full utilization of training facilities, processes, Resource person, and equipment •Other relevant tasks assigned by Manager of Training Unit
Job Requirement: Job Requirements •Bachelor’s degree in related field• At least 1 year of working experience training and development, preferably in the education industry•Knowledge of the educational industry will be an advantage•Proficient communications skills to effectively explain policies•Good presentation skills•People relationship skills•People motivation skills•English and Chinese proficiency & Computer literacy•Self-motivated, and well organized•Strong organizational and time-management skills.•Good in problem-solving, Planning, documentation skills.•Multitasking, prioritizing daily workload, and working as a team.•Efficient work, be able to work under pressure and high responsibility.•Be flexible, meticulous and adaptive to changing circumstances, honest and willing to work overtime •Be able to develop their skills and seek advice from a variety of sources How to APPLYInterested candidates may apply your CV to an email: hr@zhongying.edu.khTelegram: 015 62 5000Contact number: 015 62 5000 / 089 62 5000

• Work closely with business line on headcount planning, a clear view to forecast future hiring needs and organizational goals

• Be able to communicate well in English, Chinese is a plus
• Excellent Microsoft Office proficiency, particularly Excel
• Experience in real estate industry is a plus

Job Description:
SunCity Apartment is located in the heart of Phnom Penh capital. The first modern service-apartment building in the city It is was established on January 1st, 2012. SunCity is set in an ideal location for anyone looking for a modern and dynamic lifestyle. We are within 10 minutes walking distance to restaurants, spas, convenient stores and medical clinics. SunCity Apartment comprises of 35 luxurious and spacious units with modern interiors and full personal service designed to make your busy life easier.

We are currently looking for qualified candidate to fulfill the position of Customer Service Officer.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Receptionist (Greet and welcome customer).
• Handle customer Incoming and outgoing call.
• Assist customer to elevator and any other queries related to unit and space.
• Support in room and office inquiry (call, walk-in & email)
• Handle customer complain and relay to corresponding staff to remedy the complain
• Issue invoice and collecting payment (Cashier)
• Control and monitor office supplies, cleaning and laundry stock
• Handle staff inquiry related to room, cleaning and laundry materials, maintenance expense and employee request (roster, lunch fee, salary)
• Handle Petty cash, stock replenishment, Tenants request and request expense for reimbursement 
• Update staff attendance, work leave, missing scan & Overtime attendance (day/night)
• Clerical tasks (filing, encoding, updating staff and customer data base)
• Any other assigned tasks by Manager
Job Requirement:
• Diploma/University Degree in Business Administration, Marketing/Sales, Customer Service
• 2 years of experience in Customer Service or related field
• Computer literacy (Ms Word, Excel and Internet-Email or other software is a plus).
• Good written and spoken in English, or other languages is a plus
• Be flexible to handle customers’ complaint 
• Be able to give adequate information and support to ensure customers’ satisfaction

Location: This position is based in Phnom Penh 
Duration: Full-time work

1.ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាននៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
2.ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយជាមួយប្រជាពលរដ្ឋក្នុងតំបន់ ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
3.ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់អតិថិជនតាមផែនការរបស់ស្ថាបនដាក់ឲ្យ 
4.សិក្សាសំណើសុំខ្ចីប្រាក់ របស់អតិថិជនផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី ជូនអតិ ថិជន ( បើកប្រាក់ជូនអតិជន ) ។
5.ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជន មកទូទាត់ជាមួយបេឡាធិការ ។
6.ដោះស្រាយជាមួយ អតិថិជនដែលបង់ប្រាក់យឺត ។
7.រាយការណ៍ នឹងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានសាខា ។
8.ការងារមួយចំនួនទៀតដែលផ្តល់ដោយប្រធានសាខា ។
Job Requirement:
1សិស្សដែលប្រឡងជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប នឹងសិស្សនិស្សិតដែលកំពុង តែសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សានៅតាម សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ ។
2.ត្រូមានកាយសប្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ។
3មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ នឹងមានឆន្ទះបំពេញការងាររបស់ខ្លួន។	
4.ជាមនុស្សមានភាពបត់បែននិងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើ លើការងាររបស់ខ្លួន ។
5.ជាមនុស្សដែលមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអ្នកដ៏ទៃ។
6.មានក្រមសិលធម៌  នឹងមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ។


** សំណងទូទាត់នឹងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបាន
1.ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចាប់ពី (260$-400$) ។
2.ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម ថ្ងៃបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ នឹងភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ
3. ទទួលបានអាហារូបករណ៍១០០%ពីសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ 
ដែលខ្លួនកំពុងសិក្សា។
4.ផ្តល់ជូនកន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ ថ្លៃទឹក ភ្លើងដោយឥតបង់ប្រាក់
5.ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ២៤ ម៉ោង និងសុខភាព។
6. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្តលើស្នាដៃការងារដែលសម្រេចបាន      
7.ផ្តល់ជូនកាតទូរស័ព្ទ ឯកសណ្ឋាន និងសភារៈសម្រាប់ប្រើ   ប្រាស់ សម្រាប់បំពេញការងារ។
8.ឱកាសចាប់យកតំណែងនានាពីក្រេប៉ូ ។
9.មានប្រាក់កម្ចីសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក ដែលបម្រើការក្នុង ក្រេប៉ូ។

Job Description:
1. Operations	
 Work with management to prioritise business and information needs
 Perform data analysis (descriptive and diagnostic analytics), visualisation and communication (either reports or dashboards) that translate complex findings to communicable insights for management and business users
 Perform data mining from SQL database and other sources
 Perform data cleaning and processing to ensure the data is curated and ready for use
 Deploy statistical tools to interpret data
 Check and control data sanity from trade and challenging the answer the trade in the purpose to ensure quality of data and correct execution
 Control master data, outlets, agents, and reporting on a day-to-day basis
 Collaborate with IT to deploy analytics products in IT systems

2. Analytical	
 Perform data mining and analyse data to evaluate sale volume, market share, value chain, and business opportunities 
 Evaluate monthly and annual sales goals, quotas and forecasts, work with technology team to develop and maintain electronic systems to track and predict seasonal demand, industry shifts and customer buying changes
 Review sales performance data against commercial customer data systems.

3. Communication	
 Present actionable information and insights to team members and management
 Answer questions about delivered results/ reports through with strong facts and discipline 
 Present complex ideas and their value proposition to non-technical audience as a coherent story with clear and easy to follow conclusions (This will include visualization skill/tool).

4. Innovation	
 Continuously develop and present innovative ideas based on data driven approach to improve current business practices.
Job Requirement:
Education and Work Experiences:
- Bachelor degree in Data Science, Statistics, Economics or similar
- Proven analytical skill sets are important; it does not matter whether you are a talent fresh graduate or experienced candidate 
- Proficiency in using analytical applications & data visualization/dashboard

Job Description: The incumbent will be required to support the activities for LABS in the Apparel, Textile and Footwear sector, focusing on Structural, Electrical, and Fire safety. The person will report to the Country Manager, LABS, and will be responsible for the successful management of 50 factories, and supervision of various firms associated with LABS Initiative such as Inspection Firm (IF), Remediation Firm (RF), Quality Assurance Firm (QA), etc. The FC/Senior FC will work closely with a diverse group of stakeholders, including Brands, Factory owners, Local Authorities, Civil Society Organizations and the LABS Team. Responsibilities and DutiesSupport the implementation of LABS initiative and its standards, consistent with project objectivesDirectly manage and coordinate the assessment process for about 50 factories.Working cooperatively with others to create a safe work site environment; and communicating effectively with the facility owners, contractors and stakeholders associated with the LABS Initiative.Collaborate with Engineers and Auditors working with Remediation Firms, Inspection and Quality Assurance FirmsClarify the Corrective Action Plan (CAP) generated after assessments to factories, where neededSchedule and perform factory visits to follow-up on implementation progress of the safety audits conducted under LABS Initiative by Inspection FirmsTrack, document, and report online the factory progress summarizing gaps and opportunitiesMonitor Inspection Firm’s performance and give timely feedback to Country ManagerAttending and convening meetings as assignedRelationship building with Brand Participants, Factories, Training & Inspection FirmsProvide Training on FFC (Fair Factories Clearing house) after being trained by FFC LeadInteracting with LABS Initiative counter parts in other countries for sharing good practices and benchmarking quality control standardsAdministrative function and support as needed in the operations of the LABS Initiative including but not limited to setting up meetings, making arrangements for training, preparing minutes of meetings and participating in operations call, if needed
Job Requirement: An engineer with at least 8-10 years on site experience in conducting Structural, Fire & Electrical safety audits, preferably in Apparel, Textile and Footwear industry or any other manufacturing industryBeing able to understand technical drawings, testing, and design documents to participate in verification and validation discussionsSound knowledge of Structural, Electrical, and Fire safety aspects linked to Factory constructionProficiency in understanding Cambodian Building Codes and StandardsAble to address implementation issues and resolve conflictEducation Level: Graduation (B. Tech or B.E- Electrical/Fire)/ Post Graduation Master's Degree (Desirable)Ability to communicate reasonably well both verbally and in writing with a wide variety of people /audiences in English and local language (Khmer)Supporting Requirements Works to achieve agreed objectives and is accountable for meeting or exceeding themExperience in working with people from different cultural backgroundsRegional travel may be required (up to 40%)

Company Profile: Cambo Technology (I.S.P) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 by a group of experienced business and I.T. executives to offer local clients with computer solutions and broadband internet services.To facilitate more focused business development as an Internet service Provider, the Company changed to its present name in October 2007. With the introduction of state-of-the-art telecom equipment and its own fiber optic network constructed around and within the city of Phnom Penh Cambodia, we are committed to providing quality cost-effective and reliable internet connection to our clients. We provide Hight quality total solution products and services to meet or exceed customers expectation through continue improvement. Cambo Technology’s mission is to become the leading solution provider in Cambodia. Leveraging the strong foundation of information technologies it has built and reinforced over the years. Cambo Technology will continue to diversify its business geographically an exploit new high-growth business opportunities in this ever-changing computing industry。Our service team: Project Manager (PM)Field Engineer (OE)Customer Service Center (CSC)Our service steps:The relevant technical staff comes to do inventory of IT assets for the customer;The high-level IT system engineer comes to do a comprehensive evaluation;The engineer will do the system optimization and upgrading according to the actual situation of customer’s system;The engineer will help the customers to back up their important data;We will provide the regular training course according to the specific requirements of customers;We will provide customers with timely and effective IT Industry Advisory;We will provide customers with en effective program proposal according to customer’s actual situation of industry;We will have the regular systematic inspection for customers;We will rush to the scene within the specified time troubleshooting for the customer upon receiving the customer’s fault the phone;We have built the customer records management system (customer basic information management, customer tracking management, customer-level management, customer contract management, service support management).	Technical Support Center (TSC)

Job Description:
We are now looking for qualified candidates to fill in the position as Senior iOS Developer to join with us to develop mobile native applications of Skybooking platform.

- Manage work plan and schedule.
- Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
- Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable codes
- Architecting and developing software using best practices.
- Contribute to the team standards, learning and suggesting new technologies.
- Working with the UX/UI team, API team discussing best practices to be taken for specific platforms development.
- Identify problems and fix quickly.
- Maintaining high quality standards and continuous learning.
Job Requirement:
- At least 3-4 years’ professional working experience on Native iOS Mobile Application Development of a Company/ies or NGO.
- Holds at least a Bachelor degree majoring in Computer Science, IT or with relevant skills.
- Strong knowledge of Object-C and Swift programming is highly required.
- Strong knowledge of OOP concepts.
- The Ability to consume RESTful web services integration.
- Familiarity with cloud message APIs and Push Notifications.
- Understand of iOS design principles and interface guidelines.
- Experience with version control and project management tools.
- Experience with third-party API integration with Google, Facebook, payment gateway and SMS service.
- Knowledge of the AppStore console and publishing apps.
- Excellent problem solving, and analytical skills.
- Proven good support & communication skills with teamwork.
- Good in English and Khmer both in spoken and written.
- Able to work under time pressure, adaptability & flexibility.

position: បុគ្កលិកផ្នែកចុងភៅ (urgent)​
Job Description:
ផ្នែកទី ២: ការសង្ខេបអំពីមុខតំណែង (Section 02: Position Summary)
នៅក្នុងមុខងារនេះ ត្រូវបានបង្ហាត់បង្រៀនបន្ថែមពី ការរៀបចំមុខម្ហូប និងការផលិតអាហារប្រចំាថ្ងៃនៅក្នុងផ្នែកផ្ទះបាយកណ្តាល ដោយសហការជាមួយ Demi Chef  និង Commis I ដើម្បីអនុវត្តការងារអោយទទួលបានគុណភាព និងប្រសទិ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ស្របទៅនឹងគោលដៅរបស់ផ្នែក និងក្រុមហ៊ុន។

ផ្នែកទី ៣: ទំនួលខុសត្រូវ និងភារកិច្ចសំខាន់ៗ (Section 03: Major Responsibilities & Duties)
• ធ្វើការផលិតអាហារទៅតាមស្តង់ដារ មូលដ្ឋាន និង ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលលើជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស     ផ្សេងៗដូចជាការរៀបចំគ្រឿងផ្សំ (Mis-en-Place) ការរៀនពីរបៀបចិតបន្លែ។ល។
• ប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់ទៅតាមស្តង់ដារអនាម័យ សុវត្ថិភាពស្របតាមស្តង់ដារកំណត់
• ធានាថាសំភារៈ ឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងផ្ទះបាយមានអនាម័យ ដោយត្រូវធ្វើការជួយសំអាតជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ និងធ្វើការរៀបចំទុកដាក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• ចូលរួមជួយសំអាត និងថែរក្សាអនាម័យនៅក្នុងបរិវេណកាងារ បន្ទប់ត្រជាក់ បន្ទប់កក ទូរទឹកកក និង ទូរបង្កក
• ធ្វើការរៀបចំស្តុកអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមការណែនាំរបស់ប្រធាន
• គោរពទៅតាមគោលនយោបាយ នីតិវិធីផ្សេងៗទាំងនៅក្នុងផ្នែកផ្ទះបាយកណ្តាល និងក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន
• ទំនួលខុសត្រូវផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលបានរៀបចំដោយប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។
Job Requirement:
ផ្នែកទី ៤: តំរូវការការងារ (Section 05: Job Requirement)
កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ (Qualification):
• ការសិក្សាកំរិតមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ
• ធ្លាប់បានសិក្សារលើកម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តាលលើជំនាញធ្វើម្ហូប ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ពន្ធ័ គឺជាគុណសម្បត្តិបន្ថែម

បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ (Work Experience):
• មិនតំរូវចំាបាច់អោយមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និង សមត្ថភាព (Technical Skills and Competences):
• មានចំណេះដឹងលើជំនាញនៃការធ្វើម្ហូបកាន់តែប្រសើរ
ជំនាញទូទៅ និង សមត្ថភាព (Generic Skills and Competences):
• អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសជាការប្រសើរ
• មានទំនាក់ទំនង និងបុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈល្អ
• មានគនេយ្យភាពចំពោះការបំពេញការងារ
• មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួន
• អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ និងសម្របតាមកាលវិភាគការងារដែលបានកំណត់
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវក្រមសីលធម៌ការងារ

Job Description:
• Create new idea for advertising on TV and social media;
• Review shooting script and raw material to create a shot decision list
• Film videos on set or on location.
• Ensure that equipment for a shoot is present and working.
• Plan and shoot videos for the company; promotional & company events
• Edit footage in post-production.
• Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
• Direct other camera operators so that the needed footage is acquired.
• Produce quality videos centred with the company theme and/or as per instructed.
• Edit films and videotapes to insert music, dialogue, graphic and sound effects
• Ensure the videotape is consistent with company concepts and requirement;
• Adapt to all the revisions needed to be done accordingly.
• Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
* Qualifications and Education Requirements
- Age 21 – 35
- Prefer male only
- At least 2 years of working experiences in creative/design development.
- Proven records of high quality creative/design development.
- Be proficient in all graphic/video design programs.
- Knowledge of the production and TV commercial is an advantage.
- Ability to work independently and effectively manage team to deliver results.
- Strong knowledge of photography
- Strong interpersonal communication and a team player
- Strong command of English – multiple languages are a plus
- Be creative, friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under pressure.

* Staff’s Benefit:
- Competitive Salary
- Provide Phone, Sim Card and Phone card
- Kinds of leave 
- 30% Discount from E&M LTO
- 50% Discount from E&M Coffee
- Business Incentive 
- Yearly Appraisal 5% up to 20% Increment
- Training & Development 
- Accident Insurance
Company Profile: Establish in May. 02. 2014. E&M COFFEE has grown from month to year and year after year, we were start up with a small business and have been operating over 3 years, we look forward to expanding our coffee shop became outstanding business to serve our customer with one cup for one person at a time to increase our customer’s requirement and also increase the scope of coffee on the Cambodian market.Our Mission: we want to inspire with one cup for one person and one neighborhood a friendly, comfortable atmosphere where our customer can enjoy great quality tasting of coffee, fresh juice, food, bakery and service.Our Vision: We want to become from family member to be a part outstanding company to bring our customers the most extraordinary collection to be a part of unique experience.Our Objective: We want to inspire became a outstanding of coffee shop in Cambodia market and looking forward to earn good share of market coffee concept.Our Coffee: We’ve always trust in our coffee premium task. It's our goal want all of our coffee to be grown with the highest standards of quality; our coffee was to right selection with the highest quality beans. And our master roasters bring out the balance and rich flavor of the beans through the signature E&M Roast.Our Stores: E & M's distinctive prominence is the stylish boutique-style boutique shop and green nature that looks almost everywhere. While shopping in the store is as rich as decorating with beautiful artifacts, most of the artifacts are rarely seen elsewhere. are designed with wall paintings and white Back grounds and wallpapers. It's proventhe refined style and modernity of the coffee in the 21st century.... and a neighborhood gathering place for meeting friends and family. Our customers enjoy quality coffee bean/service, an inviting atmosphere and an exceptional beverage and food.Our Partners: We have considered all employees as family members and the best investing partners and at the core of the heart of E & M. And we firmly believe that they are looking forward to bringing good things to satisfy the needs of our customers with a glass of great coffee bean and a delicious meal.

Job Description:
Summary: 
VTrust Appraisal Co., Ltd. is a Phnom Penh based appraisal firm to providing timely and accurate valuation services with code of ethical conduct, for local and international clients including banks, private companies, individuals, underwriters, government agencies. 

- Sending indication report to customers
- Communicating with customers for information to complete indication cases
- Solving doubts and concerns of customers
- Communicating with indication team and follow-up to maintain SLA
- Training about customer service to other customer service executives
- Performing other tasks as assigned by manager
Job Requirement:
- Good Communication
- Good command English both speaking and writing
- Be able to enter the work order in the system
- Make the report of all issuing materials
- Good computer literacy in Microsoft Word, Excel, Power point.
- At least 1 years working experience in related field.

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

position: ប្រធានក្រុម ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង
Job Description:
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារការថែទំា ជួសជុល ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើងតាមអគារនីមួយៗ។
• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សានិងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារនៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម ( Maintenance Unit) ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការអនុវត្តការងារតាម Check List នៅតាមអគារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ ពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងតាំងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
• ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។
• ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ។
Job Requirement:
• បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស មេកានិច អគ្គិសនី និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ
• មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ។
• មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល3ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
• អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint ,Email។
• ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។
• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។
• មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។
• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។
• ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍ តាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស។
• គុណភាពការជួសជុលម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។
• គុណភាពការងារ។
• ការថែទាំម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងទូភ្លើង។
• សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដោះស្រាយពេលភ្លើង និងម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើងមានបញ្ហា។
• ការប្រើប្រាស់ខ្សែភ្លើងឱ្យត្រូវជាមួយកម្លំាងភ្លើង។
• ការមើលឃើញចំណុចគ្រោះថ្នាក់មុនពេលកើតឡើង។
• ការងារធ្វើតាមប្លង់ដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។
• ការប៉ាន់ស្មានសម្ភារមុនពេលធ្វើគម្រោងការងារអ្វីមួយ។
• ការងារត្រូវធ្វើតែមួយដងឱ្យចប់។
• ការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងការងារមួយ។
• សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបំពេញការងារ និងក្រោយពេលធ្វើរួច។
• ការពារសុវត្តិភាពក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារ។

*How to apply:

1. Submit your CV and Cover Letter with a 4x6 Current Photo to our email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh. Please be noted that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’ and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g., CV_Name.

Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh,Cambodia.

Tel: (855) 12 797 939 (Mon-Fri, 7:30am to 6:00pm.)

Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: ប្រធានក្រុមជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ប្រធានក្រុមជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
Job Description:
• ទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើដំណើរការ ការងារទូទៅផ្នែកម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ នៃផ្នែកថែទាំ ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ ជួសជុលថែទំា និងដំឡើងថ្មី ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ គ្រប់អគារទំាងអស់។
• រៀបចំដំណើរការ ផែនការ ការងារ និងអនុវត្តការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទំា ជួសជុល និងដំឡើងថ្មី ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ តាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឱ្យស្របតាមតម្រូវការ និងមានដំណើរការល្អ។
• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗសិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារនៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារនិងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម ( Maintenance Unit) ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុកនិងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពី ចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
• ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។
• ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារទូទៅមួយចំនួនជំនួសប្រធានផ្នែក។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ ក្នុងផ្នែកមួយ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។
• ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក។

បញ្ជាក់៖
1. ត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអត្តចរិកការងារមួយចំនួនដូចជា មានក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារត្រូវធ្វើឱ្យទាន់ពេលកំណត់ ប្រើពាក្យសម្ដីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ហ្មត់ចត់ មិនលម្អៀង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងរហ័សរហួន ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម  មិនបង្អូសបន្លាយ ឬកេងប្រវ័ញ្ចកិបកេងពេលវេលា ហាមគេចវេសការងារ មានចិត្តចេះសហការគ្នា ចេះសន្សំសំចៃ  និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងត្រូវមើលបញ្ហា ឱ្យឃើញជាបញ្ហា។
2. ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។
3. ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឃប់ពីការងារ។
4. ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។
5. ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារសម្រាប់សម្អាត។
6. ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
•	Maintaining records of all customer owed.
•	Keeping track of customers owed 
•	Checking and managing sale daily report in Quickbook 
•	Locating and contacting debtors to inquire of their payment status 
•	Investigate and resolve the problems with difficulty customers 
•	Update account status and database regularly 
•	Alert superiors of debtors unwilling or unable to pay when necessary
•	Comply with requirements when legal action is unavoidable 
•	Checking and monitoring with customer payment irregularly to company carefully 
•	Manage customer accounts through early identification of financial distress by pro-active customer contact.
•	Successfully influence the outcome for both the customer and company, limiting the escalation of arrears to litigation, with a satisfactory customer outcome.
•	Through case management, build and maintain the customer relationship for all customers in arrears building a financial profile whilst gathering information from the customer in order to negotiate a sustainable payment plan.
•	Confidently manage arrears calls, fully discussing customers’ circumstances in order to find solutions, in line with the Society’s Arrears Policy.
•	Provide support to Arrears and Collections Team as necessary.
•	Ensure compliance to policy and procedures, thus minimising conduct risk exposure.
•	Assist with the testing of any new software releases.
•	Help embed change including new processes, procedures and systems updates and to provide feedback and suggestions for process improvements.
•	Other tasks will be assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree or Master degree of banking or Accounting 
•	Working knowledge of MS Office and databases
•	Knowledge of relevant legal requirements
•	Proven experience as debt collector 
•	4 to 5 years experiences in debt collector or in banking sector 
•	Excellent communication and people skills 
•	Good at negotiating and persuading
•	Ability to be polite and compassionate without lacking confidence
