Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
CAMHR is Cambodia’s leading human resources and recruitment company, specializing in providing human capital resources and assets. Launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO. LTD, we have grown from specializing in online recruitment to offline, sourcing employees of all standards for businesses and organizations across the country. 

Through our dedicated team of internationally-trained experts, we combine state-of-the-art technology, data analysis and a comprehensive network of partners to find the right person for your business. Calling on our well-established network of potential candidates, we conduct the screening process, saving your company time while ensuring you secure the perfect person to help your business grow. 

Our success and expertise has led to thousands of jobseekers using our services every month to search the more than 5,000 live job ads, and our shift to focus on providing companies with a tool to recruit the best staff possible has seen CAMHR become Cambodia’s elite recruitment agency.

Job Description:
•	រៀបចំរាល់ការឡាយលក់ផ្ទាល់នៅលើប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ជាពិសេសធ្វើការឡាយលក់នៅលើគេហទំព័រហ្វេសប៊ុក ទាំងនៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន និងនៅតាម  គម្រោងទាំងអស់
•	យល់ដឹងច្បាស់ពីការប្រើប្រាស់ Facebook Livestream និងដឹងពីរបៀបនៃការ Live       វិដេអូលក់លើហ្វេសប៊ុក
•	ចេះរៀបចំមាតិកា(Content) ក្នុងការឡាយលក់លើទំព័រហ្វេសប៊ុក ដើម្បីអោយមានការចាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានអ្នកចូលរួមមើលការឡាយផ្ទាល់ពេលកំពុងលក់អោយបានច្រើនកុះករ
•	រៀបចំ និងសម្របសម្រួលកាលវិភាគ Livestream អោយបានល្អប្រសើរ 
•	រៀបចំស្ពតវីដេអូ និង Clip Video ខ្លីៗ ងាយយល់ ងាយចាប់អារម្មណ៍ ដោយផ្សព្វផ្សាយទាក់ទងជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុន និងគម្រោងថ្មីៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនអោយមានការចាប់អារម្មណ៍ពីសំណាក់មហាជនអោយបានច្រើនកុះករ
•	សម្របសម្រួល និងពិភាក្សាជាមួយផ្នែកលក់ ដើម្បីស្វែងរកមធ្យោបាយថ្មីៗ ក្នុងការរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រលក់តាមប្រព័ន្ធអ៊ីនធឺណេត
•	យល់ដឹងច្បាស់ពីនិន្នាការនៃខ្សែសង្វាក់ទីផ្សារស្រុកខ្មែរតាមរយៈការលក់តាមប្រព័ន្ធ
អ៊ីនធឺណេត
•	ត្រូវមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន ហើយរក្សាការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជនអោយបានល្អប្រសើរ
•	បំពេញភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗដែលចាត់តាំងពីប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។
Job Requirement:
•	បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បឋមភូមិ រឺ ទុតិយភូមិ រឺ បរិញ្ញាបត្រ
•	បទពិសោធន៌ និងជំនាញខាងផ្នែកឡាយវីដេអូលក់តាមប្រព័ន្ធអ៊ីនធឺណេត

តម្រូរការផ្សេងៗ	
•	ភាពស្រស់ស្អាត និងការរៀបចំតុបតែងខ្លួន        អោយស្អាត និងមានភាពថ្លៃថ្នូរ គឺជាតម្រូវការចាំបាច់ដែលត្រូវមាន

•	ជំនាញក្នុងការត្រិះរិះពិចារណា ការសម្រេចចិត្តនិង ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា

•	ស្មោះត្រង់ ធ្វើការជាក្រុម ការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អនិងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការខិតខំធ្វើការ

Job Description:
•	ជួយផ្តល់ការពិភាក្សាការងាររៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្ត/គោលការណ៏និងនិតិវិធីនានាក្នុងការលក់អចលនទ្រព្យជាមួយប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់អោយមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព។ 
•	គ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ទិន្នន័យលក់ និង រៀបចំផែនការងារការលក់ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ជាសប្ដាហ៏ នឹងជាប្រចាំខែ។
•	រៀបចំនឹងបង្កើតមេរៀននិងយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តក្នុងការលក់ល្អៗសំរាប់ត្រៀមឬយកទៅបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលដល់ភ្នាក់ងារចាស់និងថ្មីនិងកូនក្រុមក្នុងការរកអតិថិជនអោយចំគោលដៅ។      
•	ពង្រឹងសេ្ថរភាពផែនការលក់និងសម្ថភាពលក់របស់កូនក្រុមអោយមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពប្រកបដោយចីរភាព។     
•	បែងចែកចាត់ចែងនិងត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមដានការងាររបស់កូនក្រុមរួមទាំងកែលំអផែនការការងារកូនក្រុមដោយយផ្អែកលើលទ្ធផលជាក់ស្តែង។  
•	បញ្ជូនរបាយការណ៏ទៅកាន់ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់នូវរបាយការណ៏ សកម្មភាពប្រចាំថ្ងៃប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៏នឹងប្រចាំខែនិងរបាយកាណ៏លទ្ធផលលក់នឹងលទ្ធផលសរុបសកម្មភាពប្រចាំក្រុម។                                                                                     
•	ផ្ដល់រាល់ពត៍មាននឹងលក្ខខណ្ឌផ្សេងៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅកាន់ភ្នាក់ងារកុំអោយបាត់ពត៍មានជាដាច់ខាត។      
•	សម្របសម្រួលការងារដែលក្រុមខ្វះខាតឬត្រូវការបន្ទាន់និងលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់កូនក្រុមឬភ្នាក់ងារណាដែលលក់មិនបាន។ 
•	ស្វែងរកភ្នាក់ងារនិងដៃគូរសហការនិងគ្រប់គ្រងក្រុមភ្នាក់ងារលក់អចលនទ្រព្យប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពនិងជោគជ័យ។     
•	បំពេញនូវភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលចាត់ចែងពីថ្នាក់លើ។
Job Requirement:

•	មានកំរិតសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ័ ឫប្រហាក់ប្រហែលកំរិតស្មើ ។

•	មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវនិងមានចំណេះដឹងស្ទាត់ជំនាញក្នុងការធ្វើបទបង្ហាញជូនអតិថិជនមកទិញដីឡូតិ៏និងផ្ទះ ទាំងនៅក្នុងការិយាល័យ(Office) និងនៅការដ្ឋានដី(Plot Site) ដោយផ្ទាល់ ។

•	មានបទពិសោធក្នុងការងារលក់អចលនទ្រព្យពី១ ទៅ ២ឆ្នាំ ។
•	
•	មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ សំរាប់កម្មវិធីនានាក្នុងការងារការិយាល័យ ។ 
•	មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ

Job Description: Graphic design is responsible for creating both 2-D and 3-D designs for everything fromposters to postcards to product packaging. Graphic Design might create graphics in printand online, layout a page of text and graphics, help with the development of maps,design brochures set type, or draw an original illustration Graphic designers would beresponsible for learning the most recent editions of programs like Adobe Photoshop,Illustrator, and InDesign in order to be eligible for many jobs in the field. Graphic Designwould also be responsible for knowing how to operate peripheral hardware like printers,scanners, and digital cameras.
Job Requirement: ❖ Education/Vocational Training• At least Year3, (in particular, major in Graphic Design).❖ Experience• Minimum two-year experience of Graphic Design or a similar position.❖ Personal Qualities and Skills• Knowledge of Sale, Marketing & social media.• Good communication and problem-solving skills• Ability to work well with other staff members.• Self-motivated• Fast learner and willing to learn new skills.• Able to work in shift, weekends and public holidays.❖ Language and Knowledge• Good command of spoken and written English. Knowledge of other languages is a plusIII. Key Duties and Responsibilities• Conceptualize visuals based on requirements• Prepare rough drafts and present ideas• Develop illustrations, logos and other designs using software or by hand• Use the appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic22AE0, St. 288, S/k. BBK2, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh• Work with copywriters and creative director to produce final design• Amend designs after feedback• Ensure final graphics and layouts are visually appealing and on-brand• Prepares work to be accomplished by gathering information and materials.• Illustrating concepts by designing examples of art arrangement, size, type size and styleand submitting them for approval.• Communicating with Marketing team about layout and design.• Ensure projects are completed with high quality and on schedule• Reviewing final layouts and suggesting improvements when necessary• Possibly training more junior staff members• Report to SupervisorIV. Benefits• Rand Salaries 350$ - 800$• Paid Holidays Following the Sub – Decree of Royal Government• Sick Leave Following the labor law of Cambodia• Maternity Leave Following the labor law of Cambodia• Annual Leave Following the labor law of Cambodia (18days/ayear)• Special Leave Following the labor law of Cambodia (7days/a year)• Seniority payment &Yearly incentives• Vocational Training• NSSF insurance

•	ស្វែងរកភ្នាក់ងារថ្មីៗមកធ្វើជាដៃគូសហការណ៌ក្នុងការលក់ដើម្បីបង្កើនការលក់អោយកាន់តែរីកចំរើន។      
•	តាមដានអតិថិជនចាស់ៗដែលបានទិញហើយ  ផ្ដល់ដំណឹងថ្មីៗទៅកាន់អតិថិជនចាស់អំពីគម្រោងថ្មីរបស់ ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
•	តេទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជនដែលបានចាប់អារម្មណ៍និងគម្រោងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងស្វែងរកអតិជន   បន្ថែម។
•	បញ្ជូន ពត៌មានថ្មីៗ និងគោលការណ៍នៃលក្ខខណ្ឌបង់ប្រាក់ឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ជូនភ្នាក់ងារ និងអតិថិជន។
•	ជួយសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូនភ្នាក់ងាររាល់ពត៌មាននិងឯកសារផ្សេងៗ         ដែលចាំបាច់។
•	ជូនភ្ញៀវរឺភ្នាក់ងារទៅទីតាំងដី ធ្វើបទបង្ហាញពីគំរោងនិងធ្វើការបិទការលក់។	
•	ធ្វើបទបង្ហាញបិទការលក់ទៅកាន់ភ្ញៀវនឹងភ្នាក់ងារប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពនិងភាពជោគជ័យ។
•	អនុវត្តន៌យុទ្ធសាស្រ្ដនិងមេរៀនក្នុងការលក់ល្អៗដែលបានរៀបចំដោយប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកលក់ដើម្បីត្រៀមនិងយកទៅបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលដល់ភ្នាក់ងារចាស់និងថ្មីក្នុងការកំណត់គោលដៅលក់។
•	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃនិងប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍អោយទៅប្រធានក្រុមនិងបញ្ជូនពត៌មានកូនក្រុមភ្នាក់ងារទៅ រដ្ឋបាល។  
•	បំពេញនូវភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលចាត់ចែងពីថ្នាក់លើ។
Job Requirement:
•	មានកាយសម្បទារឹងមាំ និងសុខភាពល្អ ។
•	មានកំរិតសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ័ ឫប្រហាក់ប្រហែលកំរិតស្មើ ។
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និងយល់ច្បាស់អំពីច្បាប់ដីធ្លី ឫការធ្វើពាណិជ្ចកម្ម ។
•	មានចំណេះដឹងទាំងការសរសេនិងនិយាយភាសាខែ្មរបានល្អ ឫក៏ភាសារអង់គ្លេសបន្ថែមជាការប្រសើរ ។
•	មានទំនាក់ទំនងការងារល្អប្រសើរនិងរុះរាយជាមួយបុគ្គលិក និងអតិថិជន
•	មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវនិងមានចំណេះដឹងស្ទាត់ជំនាញក្នុងការធ្វើបទបង្ហាញជូនអតិថិជនមកទិញដីឡូតិ៏និងផ្ទះ ទាំងនៅក្នុងការិយាល័យ(Office) និងនៅការដ្ឋានដី(Plot Site) ដោយផ្ទាល់ ។
•	មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារមានសំពាធនិងអាចធ្វើការលើសម៉ោង។
•	មានបទពិសោធក្នុងការងារលក់អចលនទ្រព្យពី១ ទៅ ២ឆ្នាំ ។

•	មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ សំរាប់កម្មវិធីនានាក្នុងការងារការិយាល័យ ។ 
•	មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Bunthoeun Keo (Mr.)  088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602

Company Profile:
CAMHR is Cambodia’s leading human resources and recruitment company, specializing in providing human capital resources and assets. Launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO. LTD, we have grown from specializing in online recruitment to offline, sourcing employees of all standards for businesses and organizations across the country. 

Through our dedicated team of internationally-trained experts, we combine state-of-the-art technology, data analysis and a comprehensive network of partners to find the right person for your business. Calling on our well-established network of potential candidates, we conduct the screening process, saving your company time while ensuring you secure the perfect person to help your business grow. 

Our success and expertise has led to thousands of jobseekers using our services every month to search the more than 5,000 live job ads, and our shift to focus on providing companies with a tool to recruit the best staff possible has seen CAMHR become Cambodia’s elite recruitment agency.

Job Description: • Participate in conducting legal compliance tasks in all related areas where it has been indicated.• Review policies and procedures and ensure company’s operation fully comply with applicable laws and regulations of Cambodia and government ministries such as National Bank of Cambodia (NBC), General Department of Taxation (GDT), Ministry of Economics and Finance (MEB), Ministry of Commerce (MoC) and Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training (MoL).• Provide recommendations on deficiencies/non-compliances of operation.• Liaise with governance officer and regulator on the corporate task of the company• Review all policies and procedures of the company and ensure that all policies and procedures comply with the applicable laws in Cambodia.• Involve in updating Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and the Combating of Financing Terrorism (CFT) policies and procedures to comply with NBC regulations.• Implement policies for AML/CFT measures and provide support to branch regarding AML/CFT.• Identify Money Laundering/Financing Terrorism risks associated with new products or services or arising from the company’s operational changes, including the introduction of new technology and processes.• Provide necessary training on compliance to all relevant staff and ensure employees' awareness of AML/CFT measures including policies, control mechanisms, and channel of reporting.• Report AML/CFT to NBC• Coordinate with a local legal consultant.• Check and monitor the progress change in-laws and regulations of NBC, MEF, GDT, MoC, MoL, etc.• Perform any other related duties as required
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in laws, economics, banking and finance, business management, or a related field.• At least 2 years working experience in compliance, risk, audit-related to Bank or financial institutions.• Knowledge of AML/CFT obligation/requirement under relevant laws and regulations• Good command of Khmer and English: Speaking, Writing and Listening• Computer literacy in Ms. Word, Excel, Power-Point, Internet and E-mail• Able to work independently and under pressure.• Be honest, friendly, active, and creative.• Able to travel and work in the province when assigned•	5 days work week (Mon.-Fri.)
Company Profile:
CAMHR is Cambodia’s leading human resources and recruitment company, specializing in providing human capital resources and assets. Launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO. LTD, we have grown from specializing in online recruitment to offline, sourcing employees of all standards for businesses and organizations across the country. 

Through our dedicated team of internationally-trained experts, we combine state-of-the-art technology, data analysis and a comprehensive network of partners to find the right person for your business. Calling on our well-established network of potential candidates, we conduct the screening process, saving your company time while ensuring you secure the perfect person to help your business grow. 

Our success and expertise has led to thousands of jobseekers using our services every month to search the more than 5,000 live job ads, and our shift to focus on providing companies with a tool to recruit the best staff possible has seen CAMHR become Cambodia’s elite recruitment agency.

position: ប្រធានក្រុម ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង
Job Description:
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារការថែទំា ជួសជុល ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើងតាមអគារនីមួយៗ។
• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សានិងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារនៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម ( Maintenance Unit) ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការអនុវត្តការងារតាម Check List នៅតាមអគារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ ពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងតាំងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
• ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។
• ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ។
Job Requirement:
• បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស មេកានិច អគ្គិសនី និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ

*How to apply:

1. Submit your CV and Cover Letter with a 4x6 Current Photo to our email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh. Please be noted that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’ and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g., CV_Name.

Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh,Cambodia.

Tel: (855) 12 797 939 (Mon-Fri, 7:30am to 6:00pm.)

Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Job Description:
ក្រុមហ៊ុន គូវ៉ាហារ៉ា ភ្នំពេញ ឯ.ក យើងខ្ញុំជាក្រុមហ៊ុនជប៉ុនផ្នែកពិនិត្យគុណភាពសំលៀកបំពាក់   កាបូប   ស្បែកជើង ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្នែក Office អ្នកបញ្ចូលរបាយការណ៍ (Reporter) ដែលមានអាយុចាប់ពី២០ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៣៥ឆ្នាំ ។

* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ : ទទួលបានប្រាក់ខែគោល  ២៣០ដុល្លារ ក្នុង១ខែ។
- បូកបន្ថែមនៅពេលមានការងារថែមម៉ោង។ 
- ប្រាក់កុងត្រាមានកំណត់ ៥%។
- បំណាច់ឆ្នាំ ១៨ថ្ងៃ ក្នុង ១ឆ្នាំ។
- ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកយោងតាមក្រសួងការងារ
- មានប.ស.ស
Job Requirement:
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កំព្យូទ័របានស្ទាត់ជំនាញ (Microsoft word, excel, outlook)
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន
- មានភាពទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់
- ធ្វើការ ចន្ទ ដល់ សៅរ៍
- ចូលធ្វើការចាប់ពីម៉ោង ៨:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ ៥:០០ ល្ងាច
ទីតាំងធ្វើការ១ ភូមិកំពង់ព្រីង សង្កាត់សិត្បូ ក្រុងតាខ្មៅ ខេត្តកណ្ដាល
ទីតាំងធ្វើការ២ ឃុំវល្លិសរ  ស្រុកសំរោងទង ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ 

មានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បេក្ខជនអាចភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបចំនួន១ច្បាប់, រូបថត 4x6 ចំនួន២សន្លឹក, អត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ, សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ,សំបុត្រកំណើត មកកាន់អាស័យដ្ឋាន ភូមិ ទួលពង្រ, សង្កាត់ ចោមចៅ, ខណ្ឌ ពោធិ៍សែនជ័យ,  រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
លេខទំនាក់ទំនង ០២៣ ៩០១ ៥៩១/ ០៩៦ ៥៦៦ ១៩៨៧/ ០៧៧ ៥១៧ ២០៩

Job Description:
** Job Purpose:
Receptionists are responsible for greeting visitors and delivering exceptional customer service assistance. This entails answering calls and fielding them accordingly, addressing visitor questions and needs, and providing an overall welcoming environment. This oftentimes includes performing ad hoc administrative duties as needed. Receptionists are employed across almost every industry.

• Keep front desk tidy and presentable with all necessary material (pens and forms etc.) 
• Greet and welcome guests
• Answer all incoming calls and redirect them or keep messages; receive letters and  packages etc
• Keep detailed and accurate records of visitor requests and of calls received
• Perform duties as assigned (travel arrangements, schedules etc.)
Job Requirement:
• Proven experience as front desk representative, agent or relevant position
• Knowledge of office management and basic bookkeeping
• Proficiency in English, spoken and written. Maradin proficiency will be a plus
• Proficiency in MS Office (MS Excel and Word in particular) 
• Strong communication, good organizational and multi-tasking abilities 
• Problem-solving skills 
• High School diploma; additional qualifications will be a plus
Company Profile:
Established over 5 years ago, Belt Road Capital Management (BRCM) is a private equity investment manager focused on the Greater Mekong Sub-Region. We realize potential in private markets by financing and developing promising small- and medium-sized enterprises, attractive real estate, and essential infrastructure projects. 

Working at BRCM means bringing your purpose to life through your work. You will serve an organization that believes in better business for a better world and meet brilliant colleagues who will help you grow professionally as well as personally. If you'd like to leave a positive impact on society and be part of what we do, we'd like to meet you.

Job Description:
• Administer all servers’ services to make sure they are all properly running
• Administer all storages to make sure they are all well-functioning
• Analyze technology trends on servers and storages and propose latest technology solutions
• Conduct regular preventative maintenance and administer the servers and storages of DC and DR sites.
• Actively involved in discussion of IT issue and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- IT corrections process and give recommendation for change
• Encourage and promote a collaborative, trust and transparent working culture
• Other tasks assigned by Assistant IT Network and System Manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or relevant field
• At least 5 years of servers and storage experience
• Certified VMware, MCSE are preferred
• Experience in Server and storage vendor or Microfinance or Banking sector is preferred
• Good analysis and troubleshooting system and configuration
• Experienced in Windows(AD, DNS, DHCP, IIS, SQL, ESXi, vCenter, vMotion)
• Honesty, excellent interpersonal skills, strong negotiation skills and attention to detail
• Ability to apply IT solutions to business challenges in a cost-effective manner
• Ability to manage teams
• Meticulous approach to analysis, evaluation and problem solving
• Staff supervision, training/coaching
• Good written and spoken English.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

Job Description:
Overall Purpose of the Role: 
To involve a creative and systematic plan to solve a problem or achieve certain objectives, with the use of images, symbols or even words. It is visual communication and the aesthetic expression of concepts and ideas.

- Perform concept design studies, sketch plans and criteria/facilities programs for projects as required.
- Perform technical review of drawings and required design submission on assigned projects and to ensure conformance with company design standard
- Collaborates and energize the design team to develop solutions to design issues.
- Translate all spec and technical keys on drawing
- Produce shop drawings
- Prepare report and correspondence.
- Select and propose materials to meet design standard
- Produce real 3D rendering or sketch up.
- Duties assigned by senior architect.

EDUCATION:
- Bachelor's degree in an architectural.
- At least 2 years of experience in construction and design fields.
- In-depth understanding of operations, production and design.
- Can assess project plans and construction specifications.
- Good command of reading, writing and speaking English is a plus.
- Proficiency in computer skills program MS office (Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Microsoft project), AutoCAD, REVIT, Sketup, Vray, 3D max, Photoshop and other involved programs.
- Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.
- Passionate about building environment and care about people and environment.

position: ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
Job Description:
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាជួសជុល ថែទំា និងតម្លើងថ្មី។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការគ្រប់គ្រងឧបករណ៍ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់ កុំឱ្យបាត់បង់។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងផ្នែកប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារលាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់តាមពេលវេលាកំណត់។
• ភារៈកិច្ចផ្សេងៗទៀតចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក។

** ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជាច្រើន ជូនដល់បុគ្គលិករបស់ខ្លួន ដែលក្នុងនោះរួមមាន៖

•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  ប័ណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៏ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ
Job Requirement:
• មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• ចេះសរសេរ និងអានបានល្អ
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការអត់ធ្មត់ខ្ពស់
• ភាពវិជ្ជមាន និងការបើកចិត្តឱ្យទូលាយ
• អាកប្បកិរិយាថ្លៃថ្នូរ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
• មានរបៀប និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់
• មានទំនុកចត្តិខ្ពស់លើខ្លួនឯង
• មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ
• សកម្ម និងរហ័សរហួន
• អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
• មានការសហការណ៍ល្អ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
** Overall Purpose of the Role: 
To involve a creative and systematic plan to solve a problem or achieve certain objectives, with the use of images, symbols or even words. It is visual communication and the aesthetic expression of concepts and ideas.

- Designing, maintaining, implementing, or improving electrical system.
- Ensuring that installation and operations conform to standards and customer requirements.
- Preparing specifications for purchases of electrical equipment and materials.
- Estimating material, labor, or construction costs for budget preparation.
- Maintaining electrical equipment.
- Working with a variety of technicians.
- Review and comment on all Electrical related work performed by site engineer and contractor.
- Coordinate for verification of design issue with teamwork.
- Check quality and quantities of work on site.
- Interact with office staffs to solve out issues.
- Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION:
- Bachelor's degree in a construction-related field, such as construction management, civil engineering.
KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
- Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related construction skill.
- At least 2 years of experience in construction management.
- Speak and write English fluently 
- Strong skills in negotiating, relationship building and problem solving
- Good educational background, preferably in the field of construction management
- Proven working experience in construction project management 
- Good client-facing and internal communication skills
- Good written and verbal communication skills
- Multi-tasking skills
- Ability to work effectively despite pressure encountered during work process
- Basic computer skills 
- Time flexibility

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
Overall Purpose of the Role: 
To involve a creative and systematic plan to solve a problem or achieve certain objectives, with the use of images, symbols or even words. It is visual communication and the aesthetic expression of concepts and ideas.

- Work with managers or head of department to meet their requirement design.
- Enhance the function, safety and aesthetics of interior and exterior space.
- Select materials to propose for complete design to manager or head of department.
- Lead on communication and coordination with internal and external disciplines to ensure the complete design integration of project.
- Track and maintain project milestones, schedule and budget.
- Conduct and participate inter-department coordination on all project related issues.
- Conduct and review/approval (with participation from internal and external disciplines) of variances from company standards.
- Provide design guidance to client and colleagues as well as construction staff to adapt company design standard.
- Read and interpret blueprints.
- Negotiate prices
- Source all suppliers to search materials selection.
- Follow up with suppliers to ensure design specifications have been met.
- Always do the site inspection to make sure the construction meet the company’s standards.
- Others assigned by manager or head of department.
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION:
- Bachelor's degree in an architectural.
KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
- At least 2 years of experience in construction and design fields.
- In-depth understanding of operations, production and design.
- Can assess project plans and construction specifications.
- Good command of reading, writing and speaking English is a plus.
- Proficiency in computer skills program MS office (Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Microsoft project), AutoCAD, REVIT, Sketup, Vray, 3D max, Photoshop and other involved programs.
- Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.
- Passionate about building environment and care about people and environment.

Job Description:
Maersk Cambodia is launching 2021 L.E.A.D Program – Young Talent Development Program which initiated to young and talented Freshers or less than 2 years of experience who have a strong passion and career orientation in Logistics/Forwarders/Shipping industry. LEAD-ers will get extensive exposure to meaningful rotations and project experiences, focused mentorship, learning and development opportunities. 

Purpose / Summary:
This role has overall sales responsibility for customer relationships and performance of the assigned portfolio to ensure volume and revenue targets are met with sufficient pipeline.

Key Responsibilities:
- Manage and develop the assigned portfolio; secure business and achieve objectives within the Sales Channel (for Supply Chain, Contract Logistics, Customs, Trucking as well as Import & Export Ocean freight)
- Build a good understanding and relationship with key targeted customers and the assigned portfolio (contact, commodities, trade lanes, type of business, contract information including exceptions and service requirements)
- Build a good understanding of all service offerings to be able to offer integrated logistics solutions
- Develop customer value propositions for appropriate business opportunities. Strive for consultative sales to distinguish market presence by effectively probing and identifying needs and suggesting solutions to help customers
- Follow direction settings and stay on top of business signals to secure both long-term and short-term opportunities
- Communicate significant trends, price fluctuation and policies to assigned portfolio
- Work closely with Customer Service, Trade & Marketing, Product and other related functions to ensure customer needs and market intelligence are updated and communicated. Coordinate and execute commercial approach in response to customer needs and the market situation
- Research and understand the territory to identify and establish business contacts with potential customers
- Ensure sales systems and reporting are precise and up to date for management tracking, analysis and planning

Parameters for Success
- Volume and Profitability
- Value Selling (ocean products & supply chain services)
- Customer Satisfactions
- Sales Functional Excellence
Job Requirement:
General requirements
- Fresh graduate or less than 2 years of experience in Business Administration or related fields.
- Having desire to start career in logistics industry.
- Good command of written and spoken English.
- Conscientious, highly motivated & good initiative.
- Good problem solving and proactive mindset.
- Resilient, tenacious and persistent
- Self Motivated and performance driven 
- Good Numerate and analytical
- Maintain a high level of confidentiality. 
- Positive attitude and flexible.
Company Profile:
The A.P. Moller – Maersk Group was founded in 1904 in Denmark. Since then, the Group has grown into the largest shipping & logistics provider in the world. It has more than 300 offices and representations in over 100 countries worldwide employing more than 76,000 people. The activities, apart from shipping and logistics, include industry, retail, shipbuilding as well as oil & gas exploration.

Maersk Cambodia, its affiliated company, has been supporting the Cambodian trade since 1992, being one of the first international container shipping companies to serve the Cambodian market. It remains one of the largest container shipping lines operating in Cambodia today.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chanra  +855 2396 5671 / +855 96 673 6482 von.chanra@maersk.com 	VTrust Tower- 7th floor, No. Plot A, Street 169, Phum 12, Sangkat Vealvong, Khan 7 Makara Cambodia +855 2396 5671 / +855 96 673 6482

Job Description:
• To focus on the key Multi-Carriers Customer Facing Agent Drivers:
 - Timely Delivery of Documents;
 - Pro-Active communication;
 - Exception Management;
 - Support claim department on necessary documents;
• Fully understand all contracts and charge structures including surcharges, additional charges and accessorial charges to ensure Maersk a) delivers on its promises and b) takes every opportunity to upsell and receive value for all services provided.
• Support implementation lead on the implementation of new clients or innovative programs.
• Ensure & monitor that bookings with vendors/shippers are executed on time.
• Ensure that send quotations/ feedback timely to the customers.
• Monitor responsiveness on query resolution with shippers/ Reginal Program Manager (RPM) Team/ Customers.
• Responsible for cross sell/up sell, customer retention.
• Follow up on the Outstanding bookings & query resolution.
• Monitor, record and report the performance with recommendations on:
 - Service delivery wins
 - Service failures
• Work with the RPM Team/ Sales team to establish and strengthen customer relationships.
• Monitor on volume growth, CFS ratio, customers gross profit.
• Help group members to pro-actively foresee the potential operational problem & voice out challenges with suggested solutions with pro-actively communication to all stakeholders.
• Meet /conference call with the KCM/GDP/RPM/ Sale team members / customers to review performance/ KPI for the list of Multi-Carriers Customer Facing by monthly basis.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree level education in Business or other relevant majors.
• Preferably with a minimum of 1-year work experience in relevant industry or customer service role.
• An excellent command of spoken and written English.
• Customer-facing and interaction skills with high-level of customer orientation.
• Ability to work and thrive in a flexible matrix organization with focus on networking & active collaboration.
• Proactive and exhibits excellent problem-solving capabilities.
• Well-organized when working under pressure.
• Ambition and drive to excel together with others.
• An international mind-set and inclusive behavior.
Company Profile:
The A.P. Moller – Maersk Group was founded in 1904 in Denmark. Since then, the Group has grown into the largest shipping & logistics provider in the world. It has more than 300 offices and representations in over 100 countries worldwide employing more than 76,000 people. The activities, apart from shipping and logistics, include industry, retail, shipbuilding as well as oil & gas exploration.

Maersk Cambodia, its affiliated company, has been supporting the Cambodian trade since 1992, being one of the first international container shipping companies to serve the Cambodian market. It remains one of the largest container shipping lines operating in Cambodia today.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chanra  +855 2396 5671 / +855 96 673 6482 von.chanra@maersk.com 	VTrust Tower- 7th floor, No. Plot A, Street 169, Phum 12, Sangkat Vealvong, Khan 7 Makara Cambodia +855 2396 5671 / +855 96 673 6482

Job Description:
•	In charge of Tax
•	Close monthly report
Job Requirement:
* ល័ក្ខខ័ណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស Job requirements:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ។
- បទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច5-7ឆ្នាំផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងគណនេយ្យ។

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Ability to understand and handle architectural CAD Design
• Capable of modeling projects from minimum sketches, supervision and coordinate independently with architects and third parties when required.
• Provide efficient modeling and converting of data sets from CAD or other 3D modeling packages.
• Work on Architectural 3D modeling, Unwrapping, Texturing, Lighting, Camera Animation on Visuals and Walk-through projects.
• Ability to create extremely photo realistic Exterior, Interior, Landscape Visuals and Animation using V-Ray or any essential software.
• Experience in the use of AutoCAD architecture, Revit, 3D Studio Max, Sketch up, V-Ray, Corona, Lumion, Photoshop After Effect, Plug-in and other essential software in visualizing Architecture at very good or higher.
• Stay updated with latest software used in visualization field including.
• Good awareness of design trends and creative thinking.
• Prepare reports and correspondence.
• Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in architecture.
• At least 2 years of experience in construction and design fields.
• In-depth understanding of operations, production, and design.
• Can assess project plans and construction specifications.
• Good command of reading, writing, and speaking English is a plus.
• Proficiency in computer skills program MS office (Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Microsoft Project), AutoCAD, REVIT, SketchUp, Vray, 3D max, Photoshop, and other involved programs.
• Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.
• Passionate about building environment and care about people and environment.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
- Handle the company transactions per month, monthly billings and tax filings.
- Control Petty Cash.
- Control AP and AR.
- Knowledge about the inventory accounting system.
- Book-keeping all the transactions into the QuickBooks or accounting software.
- Generate or Prepare Monthly P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash-flow and other financial statement.
- Prepare Monthly sale & Inventory report.
- Reconcile bank statement with the cash flow in the system as well.
- Other task assigned by accounting manager
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
- Bachelor of Accounting, Finance or other related fields.
- At least 2 years experiences in related fields.
- Proficient to use Microsoft word, Excel, quick book.
- Integrity, ability to keep info (such as company information) confidential.
- Able to work independently and team under tight timelines.
- Be honest, hardworking and flexible.
Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.

Job Description:
• Plan and supervise electrical, mechanical, plumbing, air-conditioning, refrigeration, fire hose reel, alarm, cctv,ect. installation.
• Report to director on job progress and issues on a daily basis.
• Review MEP quotation of construction project on quantity, quality, brand and price.
•Advise and coordinate technical problems concerned with installation, modification and repair and maintenance of MEP system.
• Inspect work to ensure compliance with standard procedures and plans.
• Build effective working relationships with contractor and project team members.
• Make purchase order and facilitate procurement process.
• Conduct meeting with team work to deal with all MEP issues.
• Conduct training on MEP related topics and device usage.
• Ensure that Health & Safety is first and foremost in all work activities.
• Inspect MEP materials to ensure quality, quantity and sustainability.
• Ensure compliance with design and agreed materials.
• Ensure site documentation is kept up to date.
• Ensure work delegation & allocation to the construction team and monitor progress on daily, weekly and monthly basis.
• Verify MEP materials at site based on agreed quotation.

• Bachelor’s degree of electrical or mechanical.
• At least 4 years of experience in construction and design fields.
• In-depth understanding of operations, production and design.
• Can assess project plans and construction specifications.
• Good command of reading, writing and speaking English is a plus.
• Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.
• Passionate about building environment and care about people and environment.

company_name: TAING CHENG OING CONSTRUCTION & IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD.
Job Description:
Scope & Role Purpose

Executive Secretary:  
The goal of Executive Secretary (ES) is resistible for supporting senior management in the company. You will be the one to organize and maintain the executive’s schedule and assist them by performing a variety of administrative tasks. and contributing to the efficiency of the overall business by ensuring all assigned administrative duties are carried on timely and efficiently in professional Manner. 

Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Assists the Directors with daily administrative duties and completes a broad variety of administrative tasks that include managing an active calendar of appointments; completing expense reports; composing and preparing correspondence; arranging complex and detailed travel plans, itineraries and agendas and compiling documents for meetings.
•	Provides high-level, confidential administrative support to Director office. 
•	Being a quick professional with great time-management and multitasking abilities. It is with their diligence and competence in their work that executives can focus on their managerial responsibilities without worrying for other tasks.
•	Handles financial and accounting matters for the director with confidentiality
•	Prepares and sends business letter/document as private correspondence
•	Organizes and coordinates executive outreach and external relations efforts
•	Deal with Company project partners and keep confidential information on a daily basis
•	Others task as assigned by Senior Management
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Chinese, Accounting, Finance or related field
•	Proficient in Chinese, Cambodian, and English 
•	Have experience as a translator, assistant, or similar role at least 5 years
•	Age from 25 to 35
•	Excellent communication and organization skill
•	Be able to travel to the province Language proficiency spoken & written Chinese advantage.
•	Good communications interpersonal skills.
•	Ability to work under pressure and flexible working hour
•	Honest, and with high level of integrity
•	Professionalism in Appearance & Attitude

** Working Conditions 
Working Days & Hours 
-Monday to Friday:  8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
-Saturday:  8:00am to 12:00pm
-Lunch Break :  1 Hour

Reporting line 
- Document Controller works under supervision & reports directly to Project Management Director, Assistant PD and other related assignment management

•	Competitive Salary, Compensation & Benefits

•	Insurance

TCO Constructions & Import Export Co., Ltd (TCO) is a one of the largest and well recognized construction company in Cambodia. Established in 2004, with clients ranging from well-known international organization such as The World Bank, ADB, other International Agencies to local companies as well as different Cambodia Government Ministries, TCO has provided Hight quality construction services specializing in road, railway, bridge, building, ports, irrigation, water treatment plant and drainage systems.

company_name: TAING CHENG OING CONSTRUCTION & IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD.
Job Description:
Scope & Role Purpose

Mechanic:

Mechanic responsible are  inspect, service, and maintain our range of heavy-duty construction equipment. As a lead mechanic, you will be responsible for driving to the job site, inspecting engines and equipment, carrying out services, conducting repairs, and providing routine maintenance to the construction fleet.

To ensure success as a heavy equipment mechanic, Mechanic should have proven experience working with heavy machinery, be physically fit, and be able to troubleshoot issues on the job site. Ultimately, a top-notch heavy equipment mechanic can repair and service even the biggest machinery with expert care.

Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Do maintenance work at company workshops and yards
•	Driving to the job site.
•	Inspecting trucks, cranes, bulldozers, and other heavy equipment for proper performance.
•	Diagnosing faults using computerized testing equipment.
•	Adjusting equipment and replacing faulty parts.
•	Repairing damaged equipment parts.
•	Cleaning, lubricating, and conducting routine services on heavy-duty vehicles.
•	Cleaning and servicing of machine attachments like winches, blades, and side booms.
•	Performing major repair work when necessary.
•	Consulting with other mechanics on smaller jobs.
•	Reporting damaged or faulty equipment to management
Job Requirement:
•	High school diploma or related certificate
•	Certification as a heavy equipment mechanic.
•	Proven work experience as a diesel or heavy equipment mechanic.
•	Understanding of computer testing technologies.
•	Ability to lift heavy machinery.
•	Extensive knowledge of diesel engines and construction equipment.
•	Ability to work after-hours if required.
•	Good communication skills.

** Working Condition 

Working Days & Hours 
-Monday to Friday:  8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
-Saturday:  8:00am to 12:00pm
-Lunch Break :  1 Hour

Reporting line 
- Mechanic works under supervision & reports directly in technically area to Fleet Operation Manager

Job Description:
Scope & Role Purpose

Accounting Asset Controller:  
Fixed Asset Controller responsible practices record track transactions to company's assets, including tagging, labeling, transfer identification the items maintaining database inventory these assets also doing depreciation cost.

Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Coordinates, updates, and maintains tracking database for new and existing of fixed asset including asset identification, tagging number, location identification, physical count, and maintaining equipment
•	Coordinate’s transfer of equipment with Facilities and Operation team, and updates assets module for each transfer.
•	provide information for inventory or fixed asset report base on management ‘s need
•	Performs physical count of fixed asset reconciles actual stock count to computer-generated reports.
•	Doing depreciation of fixed assets cost
•	Analyst data and costing company’s fixed assets
•	Work directly with manager update regarding stock inflow outflow.
•	Review balance of fixed asset count items stock.
•	Recommend fixed assets that should be disposed to management
•	Other tasks assigned by direct supervisor
Job Requirement:
Education / Skills/ Experiences Required

•	Bachelor degree of accounting or related field
•	At least 2-3 years experiences in Fixed Assets Management
•	Strong numerical analytical skills, problem solving skill and ability analyze and interpret statistical data
•	Advance of Computer skill (Microsoft excel…)

** Working Condition 

Working Days & Hours 
-Monday to Friday :  8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm

company_name: TAING CHENG OING CONSTRUCTION & IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD.
Job Description:
Scope & Role Purpose

Site Construction Manager:

Ensure the Project Constructions process strictly follows the planned drawings by leading teams of engineers to supervise contractors and subcontractors on site to the highest technical level of standard and achieve highest possible construction quality; ensure that the construction sites are socially and environmentally friendly by conforming to construction’s health, environment and safety procedure. 

Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Manage daily operation on site to ensure the successful completion of the project by the required time, budget and quality constrains
•	Ensure timely management of any unforeseen delays
•	Monitoring and liaise with the contract’s manager and project manager on the master programs and development of stage/section project required
•	Liaise with the planning team and procurement team to ensure adequate labor and sub-contract resource is available on site
•	Carry out tool box briefings to the site teams and subcontractors
•	Plan and efficiently organize the site facilities and logistics, ensuring all equipment on site is fit for purpose and only operated by appropriately trained staff
•	Requisite all materials, and oversee the deliveries and ensure they are done so in adequate time in line with the construction program and procurement schedule
•	Effectively communicate with the design team to ensure the timely release of design information
•	Supervise, manage and motivate all site team including effective management of subcontractor activities on site ensuring they are engaged on target in line with the master program
•	Ensure workmanship and material standards are achieved in accordance with specifications, building regulations, health and safety legislation as well as quality standards
•	Ensure site team and subcontractors follow common operational standards
•	Control and monitor site waste in accordance with the Company’s Site Waste Minimization & Management Policy
•	Carrying out safety inspections and fulfilling the health, safety and welfare responsibilities as detailed in the company’s policy
•	Create and maintain good relations with clients, design teams and neighbors as well as any other stakeholders
•	Deal with emergencies on site
•	Oversee operations on site
•	Ensure the project progresses as scheduled and quality of works and safety on site
Job Requirement:
Education / Skills/ Experiences Required

•	BA in Engineering or a related filed
•	Master’s degree is preferred
•	At least five years of experience in construction
•	Strong experience in the irrigation system constructions is desired
•	Formal commissioning experience, 
•	Familiarity with construction management software packages
•	Advanced knowledge of construction management processes: means and methods
•	Expert knowledge of Project construction details and relevant rules, regulations and quality standards
•	Understanding of all facets of the construction process
•	Ability to read drawings and specifications
•	Ability to plan and see the big picture
•	Competent in conflict and crisis management
•	Leadership and basic People management skills
•	Excellent time and project management skills Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•	Ability to prioritize and manage change
•	Ability to work under pressure

Working Condition

company_name: TAING CHENG OING CONSTRUCTION & IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD.
Job Description:
Purchasing Manager:

Lead the purchasing department through planning, recruiting, delegating, and training and development; design, manage and evaluate all procurement activities in Project need needs and company objectives; collaborate with each business unit to develop procurement plans with established targets; Provide supervision and support to ensure overall functional effectiveness, operational excellence, profit maximization, and achievement of company targets.

Procurement Manager are expected to work collaboratively with key vendor partners to drive operational improvements which lead to reduced unit cost, reduced cycle time, improved output quality and an improved purchasing team performance. 

Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Provide general and direct supervision of the Function through strategic procurement planning, inventory management, and purchasing.
•	Establish and implement procurement/purchasing management project plans and its systems to ensure project needs and company objectives
•	Apply procurement management best practices and principles in the development of new and/or streamlined innovative approaches to procurement and Purchasing processes and systems
•	Constantly monitor, evaluate and assist company procurement & purchasing team regarding change management, works-in-progress, and procurement projects
•	Support procurement function in the implementation of goals, objectives, and methods for management of purchasing activities
•	Administer, and explain laws, regulations, and guidelines governing procurement & purchasing activities
•	Identify local/international vendors or materials, equipment/tool or services, interview them in order to qualify availability and terms sales.
•	Identify local contractors, subcontractors involved in the construction industry such civil, mechanical, electrical plumbing (MEP), landscape materials, hardware, and misc. materials that be will required a similar to company current active project.
•	Prepare and process requisitions purchase orders supplies equipment Management approval.
•	Leading team member in Maintaining and records goods & ordered received.
•	Review purchase orders (PO’s) and Contract’s conformance with company policy.
•	Participate the development specifications equipment, products substitute materials.
•	Assist resolving vendor contractor grievances claims against suppliers.
•	Keep contract records and files, and report and present findings of management to Managing Director, General Manager. 
•	Reduce supplier delivery risk in conjunction Procurement
•	Perform other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
•	At least 10 years of experience in procurement or a related area.
•	BA in Engineering, General Management, Master’s degree is preferred
•	At least five years of experience in construction industry 
•	Proven track record in planning, development, and implementation of procurement strategies in the construction industry
•	Well-connected within the business community at a high level both locally and internationally.
•	Knowledge of company’s rules, regulations, and procedure
•	Knowledge of procurement laws, regulations, and guidelines
•	Knowledge of market conditions, sources of supply and available commodities
•	Familiarity with the business chart of accounts
•	Intermediate to advanced proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint)
•	Strong presentation, written communication, and report-writing skills in English
•	Strong commercial awareness and business acumen
•	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
•	Strong attention to detail.
•	Ability to analyze and negotiate contracts
•	Ability to think creatively and use data to inform decisions
•	Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage timely changes.

company_name: TAING CHENG OING CONSTRUCTION & IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD.
Job Description:
Scope & Role Purpose

Talent & Organization Development Officer (TOD):  
Assist the Head of HR & General Affairs in the design, development, implementation, and evaluation of TOD initiatives/programs/processes that support organizational goals and business strategy.

Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Assist the Head of HR & General Affairs in the design, development, implementation, and evaluation of Organization Development (OD) initiatives/programs/processes that support organizational objectives and that are aligned with the organization’s business strategy. Main projects include performance management system design and development, talent management, change management, and employee engagement surveys and initiatives
•	Performance Management: assist the Head of HR & General Affairs in the management of the overall performance management system including goal-setting, quarterly reviews, mid-year reviews, performance appraisal, performance calibration, increments, and bonuses
•	Talent Management: assist and facilitate talent management programs including talent review, individual development program, succession planning and strategic workforce planning.
•	Employee Engagement: assist HRBP in conducting employee engagement surveys and interviews; perform data clean-up, data analyses, and report write-ups; and identify initiatives required to enhance employee engagement and job performance
•	Organizational Design: assist line functions and relevant stakeholders in reviewing organizational charts and organizational restructuring. 
•	Change Management: provide support to line functions on large-scaled change management initiatives
•	Assist in reviewing and adapting the on-going OD strategy to meet current organizational needs and/or to respond to change requirements
•	Prepare and ensure the accuracy and timeliness of reports and presentations delivered by the OD department to executive leaders, senior managers, and other relevant stakeholders
•	Provide the required administrative support on various on-going OD projects
•	Perform other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
Education / Skills/ Experiences Required

•	Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Psychology, Business, Education, or related field. Master’s degree is preferred
•	2 years of experience in OD or training & development or related field, talented fresh graduate also welcome
•	Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Office
•	Familiarity with qualitative and/or quantitative research
•	Strong planning, organizational, and presentation skills
•	Strong communication skills in Khmer and English
•	Strong attention to detail
•	Strong analytical skills
•	High Emotional Intelligence
•	Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•	Ability to prioritize and manage change
•	Ability to work under pressure

company_name: TAING CHENG OING CONSTRUCTION & IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD.
Job Description:
** Scope & Role Purpose

Cost & Planning Engineer:
Planning engineers analyze expenses and identify opportunities to save cost and making sure complex projects are handled on time and on budget by overseeing the project planning, inventory services, cost control, team leadership, and project management.

** Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Create Project Execution Plans
•	Project Monitoring and Reporting
•	Perform Project Coordination
•	Manage Stakeholder and Team Communication
•	Drive Process Improvement
•	Analyzing technical drawing and providing material and cost estimates. 
•	Monitor cost control of internal/external project costs with secondary progress reporting function
•	Regular interaction with Project Managers and Contractors to develop schedules and achieve critical milestones
•	Analyze Contractor Schedules and flag impact on Critical Path
•	Produce weekly and monthly progress reports against the baseline schedule
•	Control of contract and procurement costs
•	Responsible for Monthly cost/planning status reports to Management
•	Interface with Project Manager to provide all status reporting and presentations. Cost variation/amendment control, invoice approval management
•	Interface with Finance group on reporting methods, invoice approval and cash call status; 
•	Progress monitoring/reporting against overall schedule on a monthly basis required. This will be to incorporate and report at Management level
•	Define Cost Estimate Scope: Define the project scope, time period, phases to be estimated, communication channels, and establish any boundaries for estimates or project requirements. Estimates are typically completed in 24‐48 hours.  
•	Define Assumptions or Constraints: Identify any schedule or budget constraints, and how those will be resolved.  
•	Develop Cost Element Structure: Identify everything defined in the scope to be costed.  
•	Collect and Monitor Data: Collect and monitor data, manage risks, identify (if necessary) contingency plan, control changes and communication. Measure and report on progress.  
•	Develop Cost Estimating Relationships: Use cost data to develop formulas/equations entered into the cost model. Formulas/Equations will be the basis for estimating costs as a function of Ulven systems and service level.  
•	Document Approach: Provide documentation for each cost element, indicating sources of data, assumptions used and any other methodology or analysis.  
•	Finalize Cost Estimate: Finalize the cost estimate. Maintain all files, data related to this project.
Job Requirement:
Education / Skills/ Experiences Required

•	At least 3-5 years of Construction Industry 
•	BA in Engineering, General Management, Master’s degree is preferred
•	Experience in costing and Planning 
•	Experiences mad Knowledge in Project Management 
•	Advance in MS Project and or Excel. 
•	Logic thinking and analytical skills.
•	Competitive Low-cost attitude and approach.
•	PMP Certification Preferred but not required 
•	Strong presentation, written communication, and report-writing skills in English
•	Strong commercial awareness and business acumen
•	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
•	Strong attention to detail.
•	Ability to think creatively and use data to inform decisions
•	Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage timely changes.



Working Condition 

Working Days & Hours 
-Monday to Friday	:  8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
-Saturday		:  8:00am to 12:00pm
-Lunch Break 		:  1 Hour

Job Description:
Scope & Role Purpose

** Draftsman:

Draftsman create technical drawings by using computer aided design software, duties such as consulting with clients, cooperating with other workers, determining required materials and construction procedures, and checking designs for mistakes.


** Duties & Responsibilities 

•	Following specifications and calculations to create various technical drawings.
•	Preparing both rough sketches and detailed with CADD systems.
•	Performing calculations for materials and weight limitations.
•	Communicating with site engineers, and incorporating knowledge gained into drawings.
•	Preparing, reviewing and redrafting alongside Project engineering team.
•	Ensuring final designs and compliant with construction regulations and standard.
•	Identifying and communicating potential technical design problem to the rest the team.
•	Liaise site engineers gather and structural and/or technical requirements designs.
•	Calculate dimensions, weight limitations and requirements in materials.
•	Describe production methods step-by-step (including equipment and software types be used).
•	Create detailed designs with computer-aided (CAD) and related software.
•	Design diagram, maps and layouts to illustrate workflow.
•	Prepare and review rough sketches and review along with the engineering team.
•	Identify potential operational issues and redesign products improve functionality.
•	Ensure final designs comply regulations quality standards.
Job Requirement:
Education / Skills/ Experiences Required

•	Bachelor Science Engineering
•	Experience computer-aided software and drafting (CADD). Civil 3D Autocade Auto land…. 
•	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
•	Strong attention to detail.

Job Description:
Scope & Role Purpose

Document Controller: is responsible for accurate management and safeguarding of documentation generated by the project team, contractors and suppliers in support of the day‐to‐day operation of the project and in a manner that will enable all relevant parties to quickly retrieve them. This includes, but is not limited to, drawings, method statements, (operating) procedures, manuals, engineering/technical reports, correspondence and project management files.

Duties & Responsibilities 

- Control all aspects of project documentation on multiple simultaneous projects, utilizing various control methods/systems.
- Prepare, operate and update Document Control Procedures in line with the Project Management Department’s Document Control/Management System.
- Ensure proper document control support is given to Projects, Sections and Departments.
- Produce and maintain Document Progress Reports to Projects, Sections and Departments.
- Ensure all documentation provided is as per Project Management Department quality formatting requirements. Formatting may include correcting templates, fonts and style, pagination and numbering and other activities that may be required to achieve Project Management Department’s documentation requirements.
- Create Document Control and correspondence folders for individual Projects, Sections and Departments.
- Work in strict co‐operation with the Projects, Sections and Departments to ensure project progress status integration.
- Ensure all templates used with the Project Management’s Department conform to the Company standard.
- Ad hoc duties as required to assist the Project Management Department.
- Other tasks assigned by Manager.
Job Requirement:
Education / Skills/ Experiences Requried

- University student Bachelor degree any field preferred in Finance and Accounting. 
- Experience customer an advantage.
- A great personality the telephone advantage.
- Language proficiency spoken & written English must.
- Proficient in MS-office
- Language proficiency spoken & written Chinese advantage.
- Computer literate – MS Word, Excel PowerPoint
- Good communications interpersonal skills.

- Ability to work under pressure and flexible working hour
- Honest, and with high level of integrity

Job Description:
- Achieves warehouse operational objectives by contributing warehouse operations information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews.
- Preparing and completing action plans; implementing production plan, productivity, resolving problems.
- Strategically manage warehouse in compliance with company’s policies and vision
- Adhere to all warehousing, handling and shipping legislation requirements
- Maintain standards of health and safety, hygiene and security
- Recruit, select, orient, coach and motivate employees

- Receive feedback and monitor the quality of services provided
- Prepare daily work progress to head office

- Expertise in Warehouse Management Procedures and Best Practices.
- Proven ability to implement process improvement initiatives.
- Good at planning, interpersonal skills, problem-solving and critical thinking skills.
- Be friendly, hard-working, flexible, honest and willing to work as a team.
- Be able to work under pressure with high responsibility.
- Technical knowledge and skill
- Good in written and spoken English & Khmer
- Computer literate (MS Word, Excel …….)

Job Description:
•	Oversea daily transaction including account payable/receivable, general ledger, bank reconciliation and supplier list.
•	Assisting & Supervising team on daily performance and providing overall guidance.
•	Organize financial data into usable information and maintain update records
•	Verify all transactions in QB system to ensure accuracy and compliance with accounting standard and company policy.
•	Liaising with operation and other department on contracts, cash flow problem, financial irregularities and ensure that each department remain within budget.
•	Make sure that fixed asset and inventory is properly recorded and controlled
•	Coordinate and deal with external auditor and banker
•	Checking on monthly tax return prepared by team and ensuring that company taxes are paid in a timely manner.
•	Update regularly to management and managing month end and year end closing regarding company finances.
•	Other work assigned by management

Expected Out come :

Accounting Supervisor assist Accounting Manager in Managing and overseeing the daily operations of the accounting department; monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports or statements and Establishing and enforcing proper accounting methods, policies and principles

•	Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
•	Proficiency in Microsoft Advance Excel and QuickBooks
•	Working experience as an Accountant r at least 2 years.
•	Strong management, leadership and communication skills.
•	Honest, reliable, responsible and very good team work
•	Good in English speaking and writing (Chinese is a plus).
•	Good in written and spoken English & Khmer
